English Sentences: These be the words which Moses spake unto all Israel on this side Jordan in the wilderness, in the plain over against the Red sea, between Paran, and Tophel, and Laban, and Hazeroth, and Dizahab.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yarkkoppe hefinttaara, Yorddaanoosa SHaafaa matan de7iya Moo7aaba Dembban Muuse baggaara GODAI Israa7eela asaa azazido higgetinne wogati hageeta.

English Sentences: (There are eleven days' journey from Horeb by the way of mount Seir unto Kadeshbarnea.)
Wolaitta Sentences: Ha maxaafan xaafettida qaala ubbai Yorddaanoosa SHaafaappe hefintta arshsho baggaara de7iya bazzuwan eti de7ishin, Muusee Israa7eela asaayyo yootido qaalaa. Muusee ha qaalaa etau yootiyo wode, eti Suufa geetettiya sohuwan sintta baggaara, Paaraana katamau issi baggaaranne hegaadankka qassi Tofeela, Laabaana, Haxerootanne Diizahaaba geetettiya katamatu gidduwan de7iya Yorddaanoosa wombban de7oosona.

English Sentences: And it came to pass in the fortieth year, in the eleventh month, on the first day of the month, that Moses spake unto the children of Israel, according unto all that the LORD had given him in commandment unto them;
Wolaitta Sentences: Eedooma Deriyaa ogiyaara biikko, Siinaa Deriyaappe Qaadeesa-Barnne gakkanau gediyan tammanne isiini gallassa oge.

English Sentences: After he had slain Sihon the king of the Amorites, which dwelt in Heshbon, and Og the king of Bashan, which dwelt at Astaroth in Edrei:
Wolaitta Sentences: Gibxxeppe eti kiyido oitamantta laittan, tammanne isiinintta aginan, aginaayyo koiro gallassan, Muusee GODAI etabaa a azazidobaa ubbaa Israa7eelatuyyo yootiis.

English Sentences: On this side Jordan, in the land of Moab, began Moses to declare this law, saying,
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegee Haseboona kataman uttidi kawotida Amooretu Kawuwaa Sihoonanne, Asttaarootaaninne Ediraa7an uttidi kawotida Baasaane Kawuwaa Ooga, Muusee xoonidoogaappe guyyiyaana.

English Sentences: The LORD our God spake unto us in Horeb, saying, Ye have dwelt long enough in this mount:
Wolaitta Sentences: Asai Yorddaanoosappe arshsho baggaara Moo7aaban de7ishin, Muusee ha higgiyaa hagaadan yaagidi qonccissiyoogaa doommiis.

English Sentences: Turn you, and take your journey, and go to the mount of the Amorites, and unto all the places nigh thereunto, in the plain, in the hills, and in the vale, and in the south, and by the sea side, to the land of the Canaanites, and unto Lebanon, unto the great river, the river Euphrates.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Nuuni Siinaa Deriyan de7ishin, GODAI nu Xoossai nuna hagaadan yaagiis; Intte ha deriyaa bollan keehin gam77ideta.

English Sentences: Behold, I have set the land before you: go in and possess the land which the LORD sware unto your fathers, Abraham, Isaac, and Jacob, to give unto them and to their seed after them.
Wolaitta Sentences: Dunkkaaniyaa qolidi denddite; denddidi deretiya Amooretu biittaanne Aaraban de7iya eta shooro biitta ubbaa biite; hegeekka Yorddaanoosa wombbaa, deretiyaasaanne barggottiya biittatukko, tohossa baggaunne Meediteraane Abbaa gaxau aadhdhite. Kanaane biittaakko biite; Liibaanoosa dereta kanttidi, Efiraaxiisa SHaafaa gakkanaashin biite.

English Sentences: And I spake unto you at that time, saying, I am not able to bear you myself alone:
Wolaitta Sentences: Be7ite, taani intteyyo ha biittaa immaas. Biite; biidi intte aawatuyyo, Abrahaamayyo, Yisaaqayyo, Yaaqoobayyoonne, etappe guyyiyan, eta zariyaayyo immanau GODAI caaqqido biittaa laattite yaagiis" yaagiis.

English Sentences: The LORD your God hath multiplied you, and, behold, ye are this day as the stars of heaven for multitude.
Wolaitta Sentences: Qassikka Muusee asaayyo hagaadan yaagiis; "He wode taani intteyyo hagaadan yaagada yootaas; Taani tarkka inttena tookkanau danddayikke.

English Sentences: (The LORD God of your fathers make you a thousand times so many more as ye are, and bless you, as he hath promised you!)
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAI intte Xoossai intte qoodaa saluwaa xoolinttiyaadan darissiis.

English Sentences: How can I myself alone bear your cumbrance, and your burden, and your strife?
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAI intte aawatu Xoossai, inttena hagaappe sha7utoo gujjidi darissonne i giidoogaadan inttena anjjo.

English Sentences: Take you wise men, and understanding, and known among your tribes, and I will make them rulers over you.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin intte metuwaa, intte toohuwaanne intte ooshshaa ubbaa taani tarkka tookkanau waana danddayiyaanaa?

English Sentences: And ye answered me, and said, The thing which thou hast spoken is good for us to do.
Wolaitta Sentences: Intte zariyaappe zariyaappe aadhdhida eranchcha, akeekanchchanne oosuwaa meezee de7iyo asata doorite; doorin taani intte bolli eta halaqa sunttana yaagaas.

English Sentences: So I took the chief of your tribes, wise men, and known, and made them heads over you, captains over thousands, and captains over hundreds, and captains over fifties, and captains over tens, and officers among your tribes.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Yaagin inttekka tana, Nuuni oottanaadan neeni giidobai lo77o yaagideta.

English Sentences: And I charged your judges at that time, saying, Hear the causes between your brethren, and judge righteously between every man and his brother, and the stranger that is with him.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaa gishshau, taani intte zariyaappe zariyaappe aadhdhida eranchchanne oosuwaa meezee de7iyo asata ekkaas; ekkada, shaalaqa, mato halaqa, hamssaalaqa, assiraalaqanne haariyaageeta oottada intte zariyan zariyan intte bollan sunttaas.

English Sentences: Ye shall not respect persons in judgment; but ye shall hear the small as well as the great; ye shall not be afraid of the face of man; for the judgment is God's: and the cause that is too hard for you, bring it unto me, and I will hear it.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Yaatada taani eta, Intte ishanttu gidduwan de7iya mootuwaa siyite; he mootoi issi Israa7eela asappenne a ishaappe gidduwan woikko Israa7eela asaappenne hara dere asaappe gidduwan de7iyaagaa gidikkokka, siyidi xilluwaa pirddite.

English Sentences: And I commanded you at that time all the things which ye should do.
Wolaitta Sentences: Intte pirddan issi baggaa maaddoppite; gitaagaa siyiyoogaadan, guuttaagaakka hegaadan siyite; asa som77uwaassi yayyoppite; aissi giikko, pirddi Xoossaabaa. Qassi intteyyo daro deexo gidida mootuwaa taakko ehiite; hegaa taani pirddana yaagaas.

English Sentences: And when we departed from Horeb, we went through all that great and terrible wilderness, which ye saw by the way of the mountain of the Amorites, as the LORD our God commanded us; and we came to Kadeshbarnea.
Wolaitta Sentences: Qassi inttekka oottanabaa ubbaa taani he wode inttena azazaas.

English Sentences: And I said unto you, Ye are come unto the mountain of the Amorites, which the LORD our God doth give unto us.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Hegaappe guyyiyan, nuuni Siinaa Deriyaappe denddida; denddidi GODAI nu Xoossai nuna azazidoogaadan, deretiya Amooretu biittaa biyo ogiyan de7iya he intte be7ido gitanne yashshiya bazzuwaa kanttidi, Qaadeesa-Barnne gakkida.

English Sentences: Behold, the LORD thy God hath set the land before thee: go up and possess it, as the LORD God of thy fathers hath said unto thee; fear not, neither be discouraged.
Wolaitta Sentences: He wode taani intteyyo hagaadan yaagaas; GODAI nu Xoossai nuna laatissiyo deretiya Amooretu biittaa hekko ha77i gakkideta.

English Sentences: And ye came near unto me every one of you, and said, We will send men before us, and they shall search us out the land, and bring us word again by what way we must go up, and into what cities we shall come.
Wolaitta Sentences: Be7ite, GODAI intte Xoossai ha biittaa intteyyo immiis. GODAI intte aawatu Xoossai intteyyo odidoogaadan kiyidi, ha biittaa laattite; yayyoppite; ufaissaa qanxxoppite yaagaas.

English Sentences: And the saying pleased me well: and I took twelve men of you, one of a tribe:
Wolaitta Sentences: "Yaagin intte ubbai taakko yiidi tana, He biittaa xomoosidi, nuuni baanau bessiya ogiyaabaanne, nuuni gelana katamatu oduwaa nuuyyo ehiya asata nuuppe sinttau yeddoos yaagideta.

English Sentences: And they turned and went up into the mountain, and came unto the valley of Eshcol, and searched it out.
Wolaitta Sentences: "He qofai taayyo lo77o milatiis; yaatin, intteppe tammanne naa77u asaa, zariyaappe zariyaappe issi asa dooraas.

English Sentences: And they took of the fruit of the land in their hands, and brought it down unto us, and brought us word again, and said, It is a good land which the LORD our God doth give us.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti biidosona; biidi, he deretiya biittaa pude kiyidosona; qassi Eshkkoola Zanggaaraakkokka biidi, biittaa xomoosidosona.

English Sentences: Notwithstanding ye would not go up, but rebelled against the commandment of the LORD your God:
Wolaitta Sentences: He biittan mokkiyaabaappe amarida aifiyaa bantta kushiyan oiqqidi, nuukko ekki yiidosona; qassi, GODAI nu Xoossai nuuyyo immiyo biittai lo77o yaagiyo oduwaakka ehiidi odidosona.

English Sentences: And ye murmured in your tents, and said, Because the LORD hated us, he hath brought us forth out of the land of Egypt, to deliver us into the hand of the Amorites, to destroy us.
Wolaitta Sentences: "SHin intte GODAA intte Xoossaa azazuwaayyo makkalidi, kiyennan ixxideta.

English Sentences: Whither shall we go up? our brethren have discouraged our heart, saying, The people is greater and taller than we; the cities are great and walled up to heaven; and moreover we have seen the sons of the Anakims there.
Wolaitta Sentences: Intte dunkkaaniyaa giddon issoi issuwaara, hagaadan yaagidi zuuzummideta; GODAI nuna ixxido gishshau, xaissanau Amoore biittaa asatu kushiyan aatti immanau, Gibxxe biittaappe kessiis.

English Sentences: Then I said unto you, Dread not, neither be afraid of them.
Wolaitta Sentences: Nuuni awa kiyiyoo? Nu ishantti "He biittan de7iya asai nuuppe daroosonanne aduqqoosona. Katamatikka gitanne saluwaa gakkanaashin gimbbettidaageeta. Hegaa bollikka qassi Anaaqeta geetettiya daro adussa asata yan be7ida" yaagidi, nu wozanaa seerissidosona yaagideta.

English Sentences: The LORD your God which goeth before you, he shall fight for you, according to all that he did for you in Egypt before your eyes;
Wolaitta Sentences: "Hegaappe guyyiyan, taani hagaadan yaagaas; Etau yayyoppite woikko shabbirettoppite.

English Sentences: And in the wilderness, where thou hast seen how that the LORD thy God bare thee, as a man doth bear his son, in all the way that ye went, until ye came into this place.
Wolaitta Sentences: Intteppe sinttaara biya GODAI intte Xoossai kase Gibxxen intte aifiyaa sinttan i intteyyo oottidoogaadan, ha77ikka intteyyo i olettana.

English Sentences: Yet in this thing ye did not believe the LORD your God,
Wolaitta Sentences: Qassi bazzuwan, intte ha sohuwaa gakkanaashin yiido oge ubban, asi ba na7aa tookkiyoogaadan, GODAI intte Xoossai inttena tookkidoogaa be7ideta yaagaas.

English Sentences: Who went in the way before you, to search you out a place to pitch your tents in, in fire by night, to shew you by what way ye should go, and in a cloud by day.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Ha ubbaa ta yootinkka, intte dunkkaanana sohuwaa bessanaunne intte baana ogiyaa bessanau qammi tamaa tuussan,

English Sentences: And the LORD heard the voice of your words, and was wroth, and sware, saying,
Wolaitta Sentences: gallassi shaaraa tuussan inttena kaalettida GODAN, intte Xoossan, ammanibeekketa.

English Sentences: Surely there shall not one of these men of this evil generation see that good land, which I sware to give unto your fathers,
Wolaitta Sentences: "GODAI intte haasayaa siyidi hanqqettiis; hanqqettidi hagaadan yaagidi caaqqiis;

English Sentences: Save Caleb the son of Jephunneh; he shall see it, and to him will I give the land that he hath trodden upon, and to his children, because he hath wholly followed the LORD.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani intte maizza aawatuyyo immana gaada caaqqido ha lo77o biittaa, ha iita yeletaappe issoinne be7enna.

English Sentences: Also the LORD was angry with me for your sakes, saying, Thou also shalt not go in thither.
Wolaitta Sentences: He biittaa be7anai Yifune na7aa Kaaleeba xalaala. I yedhdhido biittaa ayyoonne a zariyau taani immana; aissi giikko, i ba kumetta wozanaappe GODAA kaalliis yaagidi caaqqiis.

English Sentences: But Joshua the son of Nun, which standeth before thee, he shall go in thither: encourage him: for he shall cause Israel to inherit it.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Intte gaasuwan GODAI ta bollikka hanqqettidi, hagaadan yaagiis; Muusee, harai atto neenikka he biittaa gelakka.

English Sentences: Moreover your little ones, which ye said should be a prey, and your children, which in that day had no knowledge between good and evil, they shall go in thither, and unto them will I give it, and they shall possess it.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin nena maaddiyaagee, Nawe na7ai Yaasu he biittaa gelana. I Israa7eela asaa he biittaa laatissanau de7iyo gishshau, neeni a minttetta.

English Sentences: But as for you, turn you, and take your journey into the wilderness by the way of the Red sea.
Wolaitta Sentences: Qassi intte, "Nu naati omoodettana" giido guuttatinne iitaa kehaa shaakki eribeenna intte naati he biittaa gelana. Taani he biittaa etayyo immana; etikka a laattana.

English Sentences: Then ye answered and said unto me, We have sinned against the LORD, we will go up and fight, according to all that the LORD our God commanded us. And when ye had girded on every man his weapons of war, ye were ready to go up into the hill.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin inttena gidikko, intte guyye simmidi, Zo7o Abbaa efiya ogiyaa oiqqidi, bazzo biite yaagiis.

English Sentences: And the LORD said unto me, Say unto them, Go not up, neither fight; for I am not among you; lest ye be smitten before your enemies.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Yaagin intte zaaridi taayyo hagaadan yaagideta; Nuuni GODAA bolli nagaraa oottida; ha77i nuuni GODAI nu Xoossai azazidoogaadan, kiyidi olettana yaagideta. Yaagidi intte ubbai ola miishshaa gixxideta; qassi gezze biittaa kiyidi olettanaagaakka laafabaadan qoppideta.

English Sentences: So I spake unto you; and ye would not hear, but rebelled against the commandment of the LORD, and went presumptuously up into the hill.
Wolaitta Sentences: "SHin GODAI tana, Taani etaara de7enna gishshau, eti kiyidi olettennaadan oda; hegee xayikko eta morkketi eta xoonana yaagiis.

English Sentences: And the Amorites, which dwelt in that mountain, came out against you, and chased you, as bees do, and destroyed you in Seir, even unto Hormah.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaagin taani intteyyo yootaas; shin intte GODAA azazuwaassi makkalidetappe attin, taani yootidoogaa siyibeekketa; yaatidi intte otoruwan gezze biittaa kiyideta.

English Sentences: And ye returned and wept before the LORD; but the LORD would not hearken to your voice, nor give ear unto you.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaatin, he gezze biittan de7iya Amoorati inttenaara olaa gaittidi, inttena mattai yedettiyoogaadan yedettidi, he Eedooma biittan biidi Horima gakkanaashin shocidosona.

English Sentences: So ye abode in Kadesh many days, according unto the days that ye abode there.
Wolaitta Sentences: Inttekka guyye simmidi, GODAA sinttan yeekkideta; shin GODAI intte yeehuwaa siyibeenna woikko ezggibeenna.

English Sentences: Then we turned, and took our journey into the wilderness by the way of the Red sea, as the LORD spake unto me: and we compassed mount Seir many days.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaanin Qaadeesan he intte gam77ido keena gallassaa gam77ideta.

English Sentences: And the LORD spake unto me, saying,
Wolaitta Sentences: "Hegaappe guyyiyan nuuni, GODAI tana azazidoogaadan, Zo7o Abbaa efiya ogiyaa oiqqidi, guyye simmidi, bazzo biida; hegan metootiiddi, deretiya Eedooma biittan daro gallassaa yuuyida.

English Sentences: Ye have compassed this mountain long enough: turn you northward.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Hegaappe guyyiyan, GODAI tana hagaadan yaagiis;

English Sentences: And command thou the people, saying, Ye are to pass through the coast of your brethren the children of Esau, which dwell in Seir; and they shall be afraid of you: take ye good heed unto yourselves therefore:
Wolaitta Sentences: Ha deretiya biittaa yuushshai intteyyo gidana; guyye simmidi, huuphessa baggi biite.

English Sentences: Meddle not with them; for I will not give you of their land, no, not so much as a foot breadth; because I have given mount Seir unto Esau for a possession.
Wolaitta Sentences: Asaa neeni hagaadan yaagada azaza; "Eedooman de7iya intte ishantta gidiya Eesawa naatu biittaara intte kantteeta. Eti intteyyo yayyana; shin intte keehi naagettite.

English Sentences: Ye shall buy meat of them for money, that ye may eat; and ye shall also buy water of them for money, that ye may drink.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani eta biittaappe tohoi yedhdhiyoosaa keenaanne intteyyo immenna gishshau, etaara ooyettoppite; aissi giikko, taani deretiya Eedooma biittaa laata oottada Eesawassi immarggaas.

English Sentences: For the LORD thy God hath blessed thee in all the works of thy hand: he knoweth thy walking through this great wilderness: these forty years the LORD thy God hath been with thee; thou hast lacked nothing.
Wolaitta Sentences: Intte miyo qumaanne uyiyo haattaa, etappe miishshan shammite" yaagada azaza yaagiis.

English Sentences: And when we passed by from our brethren the children of Esau, which dwelt in Seir, through the way of the plain from Elath, and from Eziongaber, we turned and passed by the way of the wilderness of Moab.
Wolaitta Sentences: "GODAI intte Xoossai intte oottidobaa ubbaa anjjiis; intte ha gooba bazzuwan hemettiyo wode, inttena naagiis. Ha oitamu laitta ubban GODAI intte Xoossai inttenaara de7iis. Aibanne intteyyo pacissibeenna.

English Sentences: And the LORD said unto me, Distress not the Moabites, neither contend with them in battle: for I will not give thee of their land for a possession; because I have given Ar unto the children of Lot for a possession.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Hegaa gishshau, nuuni nu ishantta gidiya Eesawa naati de7iyo Eedooma biittaara kanttidi biida. Qassi Eelaatanne Eexiyooni-Gaabira giyo katamatuppe denddidi, Maxine Abbaakko gattiya ogiyaa aggidi, Moo7aaba bazzuwaara aadhdhida.

English Sentences: The Emims dwelt therein in times past, a people great, and many, and tall, as the Anakims;
Wolaitta Sentences: "GODAI tana hagaadan yaagiis; Taani eta biittaappe aibanne intteyyo immenna gishshau, Moo7aaba asaara ooyettoppite woi eta oloppite; aissi giikko, Eera katamaa taani laata oottada Looxe zaretussi immarggaas yaagiis" yaagiis.

English Sentences: Which also were accounted giants, as the Anakims; but the Moabites call them Emims.
Wolaitta Sentences: He biittan kase minonne cora gidida, qassi Anaaqe zaretudan adussa gidida Eemeta geetettiya asati de7idosona.

English Sentences: The Horims also dwelt in Seir beforetime; but the children of Esau succeeded them, when they had destroyed them from before them, and dwelt in their stead; as Israel did unto the land of his possession, which the LORD gave unto them.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti Anaaqetudankka Rafaayeta geetettoosona. SHin Moo7aaba asai eta Eemeta giidi xeesees.

English Sentences: Now rise up, said I, and get you over the brook Zered. And we went over the brook Zered.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hoora biittaa asai qassi kase Eedooman de7iis; shin Israa7eelati laattanaadan GODAI etau immido biittan eti oottidoogaadan, Eesawa zareti Hoorata eta biittaappe shoddidosona; qassi bantta sinttappe eta xaissidi, eta sohuwan uttidosona.

English Sentences: And the space in which we came from Kadeshbarnea, until we were come over the brook Zered, was thirty and eight years; until all the generation of the men of war were wasted out from among the host, as the LORD sware unto them.
Wolaitta Sentences: Muusee, "GODAI nuna, Ha77i denddite; denddidi Zareeda SHaafaa pinnite yaagin, nuuni Zareeda SHaafaa pinnida.

English Sentences: For indeed the hand of the LORD was against them, to destroy them from among the host, until they were consumed.
Wolaitta Sentences: Nuuni Qaadeesa-Barnneppe denddidi, Zareeda SHaafaa pinnana gakkanaashin de7iya wodee hasttamanne hosppun laitta; he wode GODAI etayyo caaqqidoogaadan, olau gakkida he yeletaa attumaageeti ubbai wuridosona.

English Sentences: So it came to pass, when all the men of war were consumed and dead from among the people,
Wolaitta Sentences: Dunkkaanidosaappe eti muleera dim77i giidi xayana gakkanaashin, GODAA kushee eta bolli de7ees.

English Sentences: That the LORD spake unto me, saying,
Wolaitta Sentences: "Olau gakkida attuma asai ubbai muleera xayidoogaappenne asaa giddoppe haiqqi wuridoogaappe guyyiyan,

English Sentences: Thou art to pass over through Ar, the coast of Moab, this day:
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAI tana hagaadan yaagiis;

English Sentences: And when thou comest nigh over against the children of Ammon, distress them not, nor meddle with them: for I will not give thee of the land of the children of Ammon any possession; because I have given it unto the children of Lot for a possession.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eera ogiyaara hachchi intte Moo7aaba biittaa kantteeta.

English Sentences: (That also was accounted a land of giants: giants dwelt therein in old time; and the Ammonites call them Zamzummims;
Wolaitta Sentences: Intte Amoona asatu biittaa gakkiyo wode, eta qaaserettoppite woikko etaara ooyettopite. Aissi giikko, Amoona asatu biittaappe aibanne taani intteyyo laata oottada immikke. Taani he biittaa Looxe zariyaayyo laata oottada immarggaas yaagiis.

English Sentences: A people great, and many, and tall, as the Anakims; but the LORD destroyed them before them; and they succeeded them, and dwelt in their stead:
Wolaitta Sentences: He biittai kase yan de7iya asai xeesettiyo sunttan Rafaayetu biittaa geetettidi xeesettees. Qassi Amoonati eta Zaamizuumeta giidi xeesoosona.

English Sentences: As he did to the children of Esau, which dwelt in Seir, when he destroyed the Horims from before them; and they succeeded them, and dwelt in their stead even unto this day:
Wolaitta Sentences: Etikka Anaaqetudan adussa, minonne cora dere; shin GODAI eta xaissin, Amoonati eta biittaa laattidi uttidosona.

English Sentences: And the Avims which dwelt in Hazerim, even unto Azzah, the Caphtorims, which came forth out of Caphtor, destroyed them, and dwelt in their stead.)
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAI Eedooman de7iya Eesawa zaretuyyo oottidoogaadan, etayyookka oottiis; hegeekka i he biittan de7iya Hoorata xaissin, Eesawa zareti eta biittaa laattidi hachchi gakkanaashin uttidosona.

English Sentences: Rise ye up, take your journey, and pass over the river Arnon: behold, I have given into thine hand Sihon the Amorite, king of Heshbon, and his land: begin to possess it, and contend with him in battle.
Wolaitta Sentences: Gaaza gakkanaashin de7iya heeratun de7iya Aaweta gidikko, Kafttoora giyo biittaappe yiida Kafttooreti eta xaissidi, eta sohuwan uttidosona.

English Sentences: This day will I begin to put the dread of thee and the fear of thee upon the nations that are under the whole heaven, who shall hear report of thee, and shall tremble, and be in anguish because of thee.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Qassikka GODAI nuna hagaadan yaagiis; Denddite; denddidi Arnnoona SHaafaa pinnite. Be7ite, Amoore biittaa asa gidiya Haseboona Kawuwaa Sihoonanne a biittaa taani intte kushiyan aattada immaas; a olidi a biittaa laattiyoogan doommite.

English Sentences: And I sent messengers out of the wilderness of Kedemoth unto Sihon king of Heshbon with words of peace, saying,
Wolaitta Sentences: Hachchippe doommidi saloppe garssaara de7iya asai ubbai intteyyo yayyanaadan taani oottana; eti inttebaa siyiyo wode ubban, yashshan kokkorana yaagiis.

English Sentences: Let me pass through thy land: I will go along by the high way, I will neither turn unto the right hand nor to the left.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Hegaappe guyyiyan, Qidemoota Bazzuwaappe Haseboona Kawuwaa Sihoonayyo saro qaalaa kiitettiyaageetu bolli hagaadan yaagada kiittaas;

English Sentences: Thou shalt sell me meat for money, that I may eat; and give me water for money, that I may drink: only I will pass through on my feet;
Wolaitta Sentences: Nuna ne biittaara kanttissarkkii! Nuuni wogga oge xallaa oiqqidi baana; appe ushachchi woi haddirssi simmokko.

English Sentences: (As the children of Esau which dwell in Seir, and the Moabites which dwell in Ar, did unto me;) until I shall pass over Jordan into the land which the LORD our God giveth us.
Wolaitta Sentences: Nuuni miyo qumaunne uyiyo haattau miishshaa qanxxana. Nu koyiyoogee ne biittaara kanttanaagaa xalaala.

English Sentences: But Sihon king of Heshbon would not let us pass by him: for the LORD thy God hardened his spirit, and made his heart obstinate, that he might deliver him into thy hand, as appeareth this day.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eedooman de7iya Eesawa zaretinne, Eeran de7iya Moo7aaba zareti nuna kanttissidoogaadan, GODAI nu Xoossai, nuuyyo immiyo biittau Yorddaanoosa SHaafaa nuuni pinnana gakkanaashin, oge xallaara nuna aatta yaagaas.

English Sentences: And the LORD said unto me, Behold, I have begun to give Sihon and his land before thee: begin to possess, that thou mayest inherit his land.
Wolaitta Sentences: "SHin Haseboona Kawoi Sihooni nuna kanttissennan diggiis. Aissi giikko, GODAI intte Xoossai hachchi intte be7iyoogaadan, a intte kushiyan aattidi immanau a wozanaa minttidi, a morgge zozza oottiis.

English Sentences: Then Sihon came out against us, he and all his people, to fight at Jahaz.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Hegaappe guyyiyan GODAI tana, Be7a, Sihoonanne a biittaa taani neeyyo imettaa doommaas; ha77i xoonada, a biittaa laatta yaagiis.

English Sentences: And the LORD our God delivered him before us; and we smote him, and his sons, and all his people.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Yaatin, Sihooni ba asaa ubbaa ekkidi, Yahaaxa giyoosan nunaara olettanau denddiis.

English Sentences: And we took all his cities at that time, and utterly destroyed the men, and the women, and the little ones, of every city, we left none to remain:
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin GODAI nu Xoossai nuuyyo a aatti immiis; immin a, a attuma naatanne a asaa ubbaa nuuni worida.

English Sentences: Only the cattle we took for a prey unto ourselves, and the spoil of the cities which we took.
Wolaitta Sentences: He wode nuuni a katamata ubbaa omooddidi, mule katamatakka, an de7iya attuma asaara, maccaasaaranne naatuura xaissida; aibanne ashshibookko.

English Sentences: From Aroer, which is by the brink of the river of Arnon, and from the city that is by the river, even unto Gilead, there was not one city too strong for us: the LORD our God delivered all unto us:
Wolaitta Sentences: Eta mehiyaanne nuuni woraajjido katamatuppe omooddidobatu xallaa nuuyyo ekkida.

English Sentences: Only unto the land of the children of Ammon thou camest not, nor unto any place of the river Jabbok, nor unto the cities in the mountains, nor unto whatsoever the LORD our God forbad us.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Arnnoona Zanggaaraa gaxan de7iya Aaro7erappenne he wombbaa giddon de7iya katamaappe doommidi biidi Gala7aade biittaa gakkanaashin, nuuyyo minnida issi kataminne de7ibeenna. GODAI nu Xoossai eta ubbaa nu kushiyan aatti immiis.

English Sentences: Then we turned, and went up the way to Bashan: and Og the king of Bashan came out against us, he and all his people, to battle at Edrei.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin nuuni Amoona zaretu biittaakko, hegeekka Yaabooqa SHaafaa doona ubbaakko, deretiya biittaa katamatukkonne GODAI nu Xoossai nuuni baanaadan azazibeenna soho ubbaakko shiiqibookko.

English Sentences: And the LORD said unto me, Fear him not: for I will deliver him, and all his people, and his land, into thy hand; and thou shalt do unto him as thou didst unto Sihon king of the Amorites, which dwelt at Heshbon.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Hegaappe guyyiyan nuuni simmidi, Baasaane efiya ogiyaara kiyida; yaatin, Baasaane biittaa Kawoi Oogi ba olanchchatu ubbaara Ediraa7a giyo kataman nunaara olettanau kiyiis.

English Sentences: So the LORD our God delivered into our hands Og also, the king of Bashan, and all his people: and we smote him until none was left to him remaining.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin GODAI tana; Ayyo yayyoppa! Aissi giikko, taani a, a olanchchatu ubbaaranne a biittaara ne kushiyan aattada immaas. Haseboonan uttidi kawotida Amooretu Kawuwaa Sihoona bolli oottidoogaadan, neeni a bollikka oottana yaagiis.

English Sentences: And we took all his cities at that time, there was not a city which we took not from them, threescore cities, all the region of Argob, the kingdom of Og in Bashan.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Hegaa gishshau, GODAI nu Xoossai Baasaane biittaa Kawuwaa Ooganne a asaa ubbaa nu kushiyan aattidi immiis; nuuni etappe issuwaanne ashshennan wurssi worida.

English Sentences: All these cities were fenced with high walls, gates, and bars; beside unwalled towns a great many.
Wolaitta Sentences: He wode nuuni a katamata ubbaa oiqqida; nuuni oiqqibeenna issi katamikka de7enna; hegeetikka Baasaane Kawuwaa Oogi Arggooba biittan aissiyo usuppun tammu katamata.

English Sentences: And we utterly destroyed them, as we did unto Sihon king of Heshbon, utterly destroying the men, women, and children, of every city.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ha katamati ubbaikka adussa gimbbiyan direttidaageetanne penggiyaaranne gordde mittaara de7iyaageeta. Qassi gimbbe dirssai bainna keehi daro moottatikka de7oosona.

English Sentences: But all the cattle, and the spoil of the cities, we took for a prey to ourselves.
Wolaitta Sentences: Haseboona biittaa Kawuwaa Sihoona bolli oottidoogaadan, nuuni eta muleera xaissida. Eta katamata ubbaa, etan de7iya attumaara maccaaranne naatuurakka mule xaissida.

English Sentences: And we took at that time out of the hand of the two kings of the Amorites the land that was on this side Jordan, from the river of Arnon unto mount Hermon;
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin mehe ubbaanne katamatuppe bonqqidobaa omoodo oottidi, nuuyyo ekkida.

English Sentences: (Which Hermon the Sidonians call Sirion; and the Amorites call it Shenir;)
Wolaitta Sentences: "He wode nuuni Arnnoona SHaafaappe biidi Hermmoone Deriyaa gakkanaashin de7iya biittaa Yorddaanoosa SHaafaappe arshsho baggaara de7iyaagaa he naa77u Amoore biittaa kawotuppe ekkida.

English Sentences: All the cities of the plain, and all Gilead, and all Bashan, unto Salchah and Edrei, cities of the kingdom of Og in Bashan.
Wolaitta Sentences: Sidoonaa biittaa asai Hermmoone Deriyaa Siriyoone Deriyaa giidi xeegoosona; Amoore biittaa asai qassi Saniira giidi xeegoosona.

English Sentences: For only Og king of Bashan remained of the remnant of giants; behold, his bedstead was a bedstead of iron; is it not in Rabbath of the children of Ammon? nine cubits was the length thereof, and four cubits the breadth of it, after the cubit of a man.
Wolaitta Sentences: Nuuni dembba biittan de7iya katamata ubbaa, Gala7aade biitta ubbaa, Baasaane biitta ubbaanne Baasaane biittan Oogi haariyo Salaakanne Ediraa7a katamata gakkanaashin de7iya sohota oiqqida.

English Sentences: And this land, which we possessed at that time, from Aroer, which is by the river Arnon, and half mount Gilead, and the cities thereof, gave I unto the Reubenites and to the Gadites.
Wolaitta Sentences: Rafaayetuppe attidai Baasaane biittaa Kawuwaa Ooga xalla. A arssai birata arssa; he arssai hachchi gakkanaashinkka Raaba geetettiya Amoonatu kataman de7ees; ayyo geesai uddufun wara; gomppaikka oiddu wara.

English Sentences: And the rest of Gilead, and all Bashan, being the kingdom of Og, gave I unto the half tribe of Manasseh; all the region of Argob, with all Bashan, which was called the land of giants.
Wolaitta Sentences: "He biittaa nuuni laattidoogaappe guyyiyan, Arnnoona SHaafaa doonan de7iya Aaro7era katamaappe doommidi de7iya sohuwaanne, deretiya Gala7aade biittaappe baggaa a katamatuurakka Roobeela zaretuyyoonne Gaada zaretuyyo taani immaas.

English Sentences: Jair the son of Manasseh took all the country of Argob unto the coasts of Geshuri and Maachathi; and called them after his own name, Bashanhavothjair, unto this day.
Wolaitta Sentences: Gala7aadeppe attidaagaanne Oogi haariyo Baasaane biitta ubbaa, hegeekka Arggooba kawotettaa qassi Minaase zariyaappe baggatuyyo immaas. He Baasaane biittai ubbai Rafaayetu biittaa geetetti xeesettiis.

English Sentences: And I gave Gilead unto Machir.
Wolaitta Sentences: Minaase zariyaappe Yaa7iiri, kumetta Arggooba biittaa laattiis; hegeekka Gashuuratunne Maa7ikatu biittaa gaxaa gakkanaashin de7iya Baasaane biittaa. I qeeri katamata ba sunttan xeesettanaadan oottiis; hegaa gishshau, eti hachchi gakkanaashin, Yaa7iira katamata geetetti xeesettoosona.

English Sentences: And unto the Reubenites and unto the Gadites I gave from Gilead even unto the river Arnon half the valley, and the border even unto the river Jabbok, which is the border of the children of Ammon;
Wolaitta Sentences: "Qassi Gala7aade biittaakka Minaase zare gidiya Maakiirassi immaas.

English Sentences: The plain also, and Jordan, and the coast thereof, from Chinnereth even unto the sea of the plain, even the salt sea, under Ashdothpisgah eastward.
Wolaitta Sentences: Roobeelanne Gaada zariyau Gala7aadeppe biidi Arnnoona SHaafaa mataa gakkanaashin de7iya biittaa immaas. Tohossa baggaara etau Arnnoona SHaafau baggai zawa; qassi huuphessa baggaara Amoonatu biittaa gaxa gidiya Yaabooqa SHaafai zawa.

English Sentences: And I commanded you at that time, saying, The LORD your God hath given you this land to possess it: ye shall pass over armed before your brethren the children of Israel, all that are meet for the war.
Wolaitta Sentences: Arggo baggaara, eta zawai Aaraban de7iya Yorddaanoosa SHaafaa gakkees; hegeekka Galiila Abbaappe doommidi Pisgga Deriyaa xaphon de7iya Haiquwaa Abbaa, hegeenne Maxine Abbaa gakkanaashiina.

English Sentences: But your wives, and your little ones, and your cattle, (for I know that ye have much cattle,) shall abide in your cities which I have given you;
Wolaitta Sentences: "He wode taani inttena hagaadan yaagada azazaas; GODAI intte Xoossai ha biittaa intte laattanaadan intteyyo immiis. Simmi intteyyo de7iya tooranchcha asa ubbaa ola miishshaa gixissidi, intte ishantta gidiya Israa7eela asaappe sinttaara olettanau aadhdhite.

English Sentences: Until the LORD have given rest unto your brethren, as well as unto you, and until they also possess the land which the LORD your God hath given them beyond Jordan: and then shall ye return every man unto his possession, which I have given you.
Wolaitta Sentences: Intteyyo daro mehee de7iyoogaa taani erais; hegaa gishshau, intte keettaayeti, intte guutta naatinne intte mehee taani intteyyo immido katamatun de7ishshona.

English Sentences: And I commanded Joshua at that time, saying, Thine eyes have seen all that the LORD your God hath done unto these two kings: so shall the LORD do unto all the kingdoms whither thou passest.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegeenne, GODAI inttena shemppissidoogaadan, intte ishanttakka shemppissana gakkanaashiinanne, qassi Yorddaanoosa SHaafaa hefinttan, GODAI intte Xoossai etayyo immiyo biittaa eti ekkana gakkanaashiina. Hegaappe guyyiyan, intte huuphiyan huuphiyan, taani intteyyo immido biittaa simmeeta yaagaas.

English Sentences: Ye shall not fear them: for the LORD your God he shall fight for you.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Taani he wode Yaasa hagaadan yaagada azazaas; GODAI, intte Xoossai, ha naa77u kawotu bolli oottidobaa ubbaa neeni ne aifiyan be7adasa; intte oiqqanau biyo kawotettatu ubbaa bollikka GODAI hegaadan oottana.

English Sentences: And I besought the LORD at that time, saying,
Wolaitta Sentences: Intte gishshau olettiyaagee, GODAA intte Xoossaa gidiyo gishshau, etau yayyoppite yaagaas.

English Sentences: O Lord GOD, thou hast begun to shew thy servant thy greatness, and thy mighty hand: for what God is there in heaven or in earth, that can do according to thy works, and according to thy might?
Wolaitta Sentences: "He wode taani hagaadan yaagada GODAA minttada woossaas;

English Sentences: I pray thee, let me go over, and see the good land that is beyond Jordan, that goodly mountain, and Lebanon.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ubbaa Haariya GODAU, ne gitatettaanne ne mino kushiyaa tana, ne ashkkaraa bessanau doommadasa; aissi giikko, neegaadan hagaa mala oosotanne wolqqaamabata oottanau danddayiyai salon gidin sa7an ai xoossi de7ii?

English Sentences: But the LORD was wroth with me for your sakes, and would not hear me: and the LORD said unto me, Let it suffice thee; speak no more unto me of this matter.
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAU! Taani baada Yorddaanoosa SHaafaappe, hefinttan de7iya he lo77o deretiya biittaanne Liibaanoosa be7anaadan tana yeddarkkii! yaagaas.

English Sentences: Get thee up into the top of Pisgah, and lift up thine eyes westward, and northward, and southward, and eastward, and behold it with thine eyes: for thou shalt not go over this Jordan.
Wolaitta Sentences: "SHin GODAI intte gaasuwan tana hanqqettidi, taayyo siyennan ixxiis; ixxidi GODAI tana hagaadan yaagiis; Simmi neeyyo gidana; ha yohuwaa denttada naa77antto taayyo haasayoppa.

English Sentences: But charge Joshua, and encourage him, and strengthen him: for he shall go over before this people, and he shall cause them to inherit the land which thou shalt see.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaa aggada denddada, Pisgga Deriyaa huuphiyaa kiya; hegan eqqada biittau arggo baggi, huuphessi, tohossinne arshsho baggi ne aifiyaa denttada xeella. Aissi giikko, neeni ha Yorddaanoosa SHaafaa mulekka pinnakka.

English Sentences: So we abode in the valley over against Bethpeor.
Wolaitta Sentences: Mati neeni Yaasussi azazuwaa imma; a xalissanne minttetta; aissi giikko, i ha asaa kaalettidi pinttananne ha neeni be7iyo biittaa i eta laatissana yaagiis.

English Sentences: Now therefore hearken, O Israel, unto the statutes and unto the judgments, which I teach you, for to do them, that ye may live, and go in and possess the land which the LORD God of your fathers giveth you.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Hegaa gishshau, nuuni Beeti-Pa7oora katamaa sinttan de7iya wombban gam77ida" yaagiis.

English Sentences: Ye shall not add unto the word which I command you, neither shall ye diminish ought from it, that ye may keep the commandments of the LORD your God which I command you.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaappe guyyiyan, Muusee asaa hagaadan yaagiis; "Ha77ikka Israa7eela asau, intte de7uwan de7anaadaaninne GODAI, intte maizza aawatu Xoossai, intteyyo immiyo biittaa intte laattanaadan, taani inttena tamaarissiyo awaajuwaanne higgiyaa siyitenne oottite.

English Sentences: Your eyes have seen what the LORD did because of Baalpeor: for all the men that followed Baalpeor, the LORD thy God hath destroyed them from among you.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani inttena azaziyo GODAA intte Xoossaa azazuwaa naagiteppe attin, a bolli ainne gujjoppite; qassi appe ainne pacissoppite.

English Sentences: But ye that did cleave unto the LORD your God are alive every one of you this day.
Wolaitta Sentences: Pa7oora Deriyaa bollan GODAI oottidobaa intte intte aifiyan be7ideta; GODAI intte Xoossai Pa7ooran de7iya Ba7aalassi goinnidaageeta ubbaa intte giddoppe xaissiis.

English Sentences: Behold, I have taught you statutes and judgments, even as the LORD my God commanded me, that ye should do so in the land whither ye go to possess it.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin intte GODAASSI, intte Xoossaassi, ammanettido gishshau, hachchi gakkanaashin ubbaikka de7uwan de7eeta.

English Sentences: Keep therefore and do them; for this is your wisdom and your understanding in the sight of the nations, which shall hear all these statutes, and say, Surely this great nation is a wise and understanding people.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Be7ite, intte laattanau geliyo biittan oottana mala, GODAI, ta Xoossai tana azazidoogaadan, awaajuwaanne higgiyaa taani inttena tamaarissaas.

English Sentences: For what nation is there so great, who hath God so nigh unto them, as the LORD our God is in all things that we call upon him for?
Wolaitta Sentences: Intte eta naagitenne oottite; hegaa intte oottikko, intte ai keena aadhdhida eranchchakkonne hara asai inttena be7ana. Eti ha awaajuwaabaa siyiyo wode, Tumukka ha gita kawotettai aadhdhida eranchchanne akeekanchcha kawotetta yaagana.

English Sentences: And what nation is there so great, that hath statutes and judgments so righteous as all this law, which I set before you this day?
Wolaitta Sentences: "Nuuni a xeesiyo wode audenne, GODAI nu Xoossai nuuyyo mata gidiyoogaadan, mata xoossi ayyo de7iyo ai wolqqaama kawotetti de7ii?

English Sentences: Only take heed to thyself, and keep thy soul diligently, lest thou forget the things which thine eyes have seen, and lest they depart from thy heart all the days of thy life: but teach them thy sons, and thy sons' sons;
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani hachchi intte sinttan wottiyo ha higge ubbaadan xillo gidida awaajoinne higgee de7iyo hara ai gita kawotetti de7ii?

English Sentences: Specially the day that thou stoodest before the LORD thy God in Horeb, when the LORD said unto me, Gather me the people together, and I will make them hear my words, that they may learn to fear me all the days that they shall live upon the earth, and that they may teach their children.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Simmi intte de7iyo laitta ubban ha intte be7idobaa ubbaa dogennaadaaninne intte huuphiyaappe xaissennaadan naagettite; intte naatanne intte naatu naata tamaarissite.

English Sentences: And ye came near and stood under the mountain; and the mountain burned with fire unto the midst of heaven, with darkness, clouds, and thick darkness.
Wolaitta Sentences: Siinaa Deriyaa bollan GODAA intte Xoossaa sinttan intte eqqido wode, GODAI tana, Ha sa7an de7ido wode ubban, eti taayyo yayyiyoogaa tamaaranaadaaninne bantta naatakka hegaa tamaarissanaadan, taani ta qaalaa eta sissana mala, asaa taakko shiishsha giidoogaa hassayite.

English Sentences: And the LORD spake unto you out of the midst of the fire: ye heard the voice of the words, but saw no similitude; only ye heard a voice.
Wolaitta Sentences: "He wode intte shiiqidi deriyaa xaphon eqqideta; saluwaayyo giddo ginaa gakkanaashin, he deriyaa bollan tamai eexxees; he deriyaa xaphoi sakkana xumaaninne shaaran goozetti uttiis.

English Sentences: And he declared unto you his covenant, which he commanded you to perform, even ten commandments; and he wrote them upon two tables of stone.
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAIKKA tamaa gidoppe intteyyo haasayiis; haasayin intte a cenggurssaa siyidetappe attin, a be7ibeekketa.

English Sentences: And the LORD commanded me at that time to teach you statutes and judgments, that ye might do them in the land whither ye go over to possess it.
Wolaitta Sentences: Intte oottanaadan i inttena azazido ba maachchaa intteyyo yootiis; hegeetikka Tammu Azazota. I eta naa77u masettida shuchchatu bolli xaafiis.

English Sentences: Take ye therefore good heed unto yourselves; for ye saw no manner of similitude on the day that the LORD spake unto you in Horeb out of the midst of the fire:
Wolaitta Sentences: Intte laattanau biyo biittan oottanaadan, awaajuwaanne higgiyaa inttena tamaarissana mala, GODAI tana he wode azaziis.

English Sentences: Lest ye corrupt yourselves, and make you a graven image, the similitude of any figure, the likeness of male or female,
Wolaitta Sentences: "GODAI Siinaa Deriyaa bollan tamaa gidoppe intteyyo haasayido gallassi, intte a be7ibeenna gishshau, keehippe naagettite.

English Sentences: The likeness of any beast that is on the earth, the likeness of any winged fowl that flieth in the air,
Wolaitta Sentences: Attuma woikko macca meran oosettidabaa gidin,

English Sentences: The likeness of any thing that creepeth on the ground, the likeness of any fish that is in the waters beneath the earth:
Wolaitta Sentences: sa7an de7iya do7a ubbaa leemiso gidin, salo gufantton paalliya kafo ubbaa leemiso gidin,

English Sentences: And lest thou lift up thine eyes unto heaven, and when thou seest the sun, and the moon, and the stars, even all the host of heaven, shouldest be driven to worship them, and serve them, which the LORD thy God hath divided unto all nations under the whole heaven.
Wolaitta Sentences: sa7aa bollan qaaxxiyaabatu leemiso gidin, biittaappekka garssaara haattaa giddon de7iya moliyaa leemiso gidinkka, intte tunennaadan masettidabaa intteyyo xoossa oottidi goinnoppite.

English Sentences: But the LORD hath taken you, and brought you forth out of the iron furnace, even out of Egypt, to be unto him a people of inheritance, as ye are this day.
Wolaitta Sentences: Qassi saluwaa pude xeellidi, GODAI intte Xoossai saloppe garssaara de7iya kawotettatussi ubbaassi immido awaa, aginaa, xoolinttetanne saluwaa meretata ubbaa be7idi, intte etassi goinnidi, balennaadan naagettite.

English Sentences: Furthermore the LORD was angry with me for your sakes, and sware that I should not go over Jordan, and that I should not go in unto that good land, which the LORD thy God giveth thee for an inheritance:
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin GODAI inttena hachchi intte gidiyoogaadan, baayyo dummatida asa oottanau birata cooce mala gidiya Gibxxeppe kessidi ehiis.

English Sentences: But I must die in this land, I must not go over Jordan: but ye shall go over, and possess that good land.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Qassi intte gaasuwan GODAI tana hanqqettiis; hanqqettidi taani Yorddaanoosa pinnennaadaaninne, GODAI, intte Xoossai, laata oottidi intteyyo immiyo lo77o biittaa taani gelennaadan caaqqiis.

English Sentences: Take heed unto yourselves, lest ye forget the covenant of the LORD your God, which he made with you, and make you a graven image, or the likeness of any thing, which the LORD thy God hath forbidden thee.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaa gishshau, taani Yorddaanoosa SHaafaa pinnennan ha biittan haiqqana; shin intte pinnidi, he lo77o biittaa laatteeta.

English Sentences: For the LORD thy God is a consuming fire, even a jealous God.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaa gishshau, GODAI intte Xoossai inttenaara maacettido maachchaa dogoppite. Qassi GODAI intte Xoossai inttena oottoppite giido ai meran masettida misiliyaa gidikkonne intteyyo eeqa oottennaadan naagettite.

English Sentences: When thou shalt beget children, and children's children, and ye shall have remained long in the land, and shall corrupt yourselves, and make a graven image, or the likeness of any thing, and shall do evil in the sight of the LORD thy God, to provoke him to anger:
Wolaitta Sentences: Aissi giikko, GODAI intte Xoossai miya tamanne qanaatiya Xoossaa.

English Sentences: I call heaven and earth to witness against you this day, that ye shall soon utterly perish from off the land whereunto ye go over Jordan to possess it; ye shall not prolong your days upon it, but shall utterly be destroyed.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Intte naatanne, naatu naata yelidi he biittan adussa wodiyaa de7iyo wode, ai meran gidikkonne masettida misiliyau goinnidi tunikko, qassi GODAA intte Xoossaa hanqqetissanau a sinttan iitabaa oottikko,

English Sentences: And the LORD shall scatter you among the nations, and ye shall be left few in number among the heathen, whither the LORD shall lead you.
Wolaitta Sentences: intte Yorddaanoosa SHaafaa pinnidi laattanau biyo biittaappe issoinne attennan, elle xayanaagau, taani intte bollan hachchi saluwaanne sa7aa markkayais. Intte muleerakka xayanaappe attin, he biittan adussa wodiyaa de7ekketa.

English Sentences: And there ye shall serve gods, the work of men's hands, wood and stone, which neither see, nor hear, nor eat, nor smell.
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAI inttena hara asaa giddon laalana; he inttena i laaliyo kawotettatu giddon intte qoodai guutta gidana.

English Sentences: But if from thence thou shalt seek the LORD thy God, thou shalt find him, if thou seek him with all thy heart and with all thy soul.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegan intte mittaappenne shuchchaappe asa kushiyan giigida be7enna, siyenna, meennanne singgenna xoossatussi goinnana.

English Sentences: When thou art in tribulation, and all these things are come upon thee, even in the latter days, if thou turn to the LORD thy God, and shalt be obedient unto his voice;
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin hegan de7iiddi, intte GODAA, intte Xoossaa koyana; intte a intte kumetta wozanaappenne intte kumetta shemppuwaappe koyikko demmana.

English Sentences: (For the LORD thy God is a merciful God;) he will not forsake thee, neither destroy thee, nor forget the covenant of thy fathers which he sware unto them.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ha ubba metuwaa giddon intte un77ettidi de7idi, wodiyaa wurssettan GODAAKKO, intte Xoossaakko, intte simmananne a qaalaayyookka azazettana.

English Sentences: For ask now of the days that are past, which were before thee, since the day that God created man upon the earth, and ask from the one side of heaven unto the other, whether there hath been any such thing as this great thing is, or hath been heard like it?
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAI intte Xoossai maarotettan kumida Xoossaa gidiyo gishshau, i inttena aggenna; woikko xaissenna; intte aawatussi i caaqqido maachchaakka dogenna.

English Sentences: Did ever people hear the voice of God speaking out of the midst of the fire, as thou hast heard, and live?
Wolaitta Sentences: "GODAI biittan asa medhdhido gallassaappe doommidi, intteppe kase aadhdhida wodiyaa ane qorite; hagaa mala gitabai mulekka hani eriyaakko woi siyetti eriyaakko, saluwaayyo ha gaxaappe ya gaxaa gakkanaashin ane oichchite.

English Sentences: Or hath God assayed to go and take him a nation from the midst of another nation, by temptations, by signs, and by wonders, and by war, and by a mighty hand, and by a stretched out arm, and by great terrors, according to all that the LORD your God did for you in Egypt before your eyes?
Wolaitta Sentences: Tamaa lacuwaa giddoora GODAI haasayin siyidi, intte xayennan de7uwan de7idoogaadan, GODAI haasayin siyidi, de7uwan de7ida hara asi de7ii?

English Sentences: Unto thee it was shewed, that thou mightest know that the LORD he is God; there is none else beside him.
Wolaitta Sentences: Woikko GODAI intte Xoossai intte xeellishin, Gibxxe biittan intteyyo oottidoogaadan, paaciyan, malaatan, maalaalissiyaaban, olan wolqqaama kushiyaaninne micettida qesiyan, qassi gita yashshan hara kawotettaa giddo gelidi, issi kawotettaa baayyo ekkanau baaxetida hara xoossi de7ii?

English Sentences: Out of heaven he made thee to hear his voice, that he might instruct thee: and upon earth he shewed thee his great fire; and thou heardest his words out of the midst of the fire.
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAI Xoossaa gidiyoogaa intte erana mala, hegaa i inttena bessiis; appe attin hari baawa.

English Sentences: And because he loved thy fathers, therefore he chose their seed after them, and brought thee out in his sight with his mighty power out of Egypt;
Wolaitta Sentences: I inttena tamaarissanau koyido gishshau, ba cenggurssaa saluwaappe inttena sissiis. Qassi ha sa7an ba gita tamaa inttena bessiis; he tamaa giddoppe intte a qaalaa siyideta.

English Sentences: To drive out nations from before thee greater and mightier than thou art, to bring thee in, to give thee their land for an inheritance, as it is this day.
Wolaitta Sentences: I hegaa oottidoogee intte aawata siiqidoogaappe denddidaagan, etappe guyyiyan yelettiya eta zareta doorido gishshaassa. Qassi inttenakka Gibxxeppe ba gita wolqqan kessido gishshaassa.

English Sentences: Know therefore this day, and consider it in thine heart, that the LORD he is God in heaven above, and upon the earth beneath: there is none else.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hachchi intte be7iyoogaadan, inttena gelissanaunne eta biittaa intteyyo laata oottidi immanau, intteppe dariyaanne wolqqaamiya kawotettata intte sinttappe yedettiis.

English Sentences: Thou shalt keep therefore his statutes, and his commandments, which I command thee this day, that it may go well with thee, and with thy children after thee, and that thou mayest prolong thy days upon the earth, which the LORD thy God giveth thee, for ever.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Simmi yaakko, bolla saluwan gidin, garssa sa7an gidin, GODAI Xoossaa gidiyoogaa erite; intte wozanankka wottite; hara xoossi baawa.

English Sentences: Then Moses severed three cities on this side Jordan toward the sunrising;
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaa gishshau, intteyyoonne intteppe guyyiyan intte naatuyyo ubbabai lo77o gidanaadan, qassi GODAI intte Xoossai intteyyo merinau immiyo biittan intte baree aduqqanaadan, taani hachchi inttena azaziyo awaajuwaanne higgiyaa naagite" yaagiis.

English Sentences: That the slayer might flee thither, which should kill his neighbour unawares, and hated him not in times past; and that fleeing unto one of these cities he might live:
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaappe guyyiyan, Muusee Yorddaanoosa hefinttan arshsho baggaara heezzu katamata dummayiis.

English Sentences: Namely, Bezer in the wilderness, in the plain country, of the Reubenites; and Ramoth in Gilead, of the Gadites; and Golan in Bashan, of the Manassites.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaa i dummayidoogee kase morkketetti bainnan de7ishin, erennan, ba shooruwaa worida asi yaa baqatanaassa. He katamatuppe issuwau baqatidi, he bitanee ba shemppuwaa ashshanau danddayees.

English Sentences: And this is the law which Moses set before the children of Israel:
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaa gishshau, Roobeela zariyau bazzon xoqqasan de7iya Beexera katamaa, Gaada zariyau Gala7aaden de7iya Raamootanne Minaase zariyau Baasaanen de7iya Golaana katamata dummayiis.

English Sentences: These are the testimonies, and the statutes, and the judgments, which Moses spake unto the children of Israel, after they came forth out of Egypt,
Wolaitta Sentences: Muusee Israa7eela asaayyo immido GODAA higgee hagaa.

English Sentences: On this side Jordan, in the valley over against Bethpeor, in the land of Sihon king of the Amorites, who dwelt at Heshbon, whom Moses and the children of Israel smote, after they were come forth out of Egypt:
Wolaitta Sentences: Ha wogaa, awaajuwaanne higgiyaa eti Gibxxeppe kiyidi, Beeti-Pa7oora katamaa sinttan de7iya,

English Sentences: And they possessed his land, and the land of Og king of Bashan, two kings of the Amorites, which were on this side Jordan toward the sunrising;
Wolaitta Sentences: Yorddaanoosappe arshsho baggaara de7iya wombban de7ishin, etau immiis. He sohoi Haseboonan uttidi Amoore haariya Kawuwaa Sihoona biittaa giddoona. Muuseenne Israa7eela asai Gibxxeppe kiyido wode, Sihoona olidi xoonidosona.

English Sentences: From Aroer, which is by the bank of the river Arnon, even unto mount Sion, which is Hermon,
Wolaitta Sentences: He wode eti a biittaanne Baasaane Kawuwaa Ooga biittaa, hegeekka qassi Yorddaanoosappe arshsho baggaara de7iya naa77u Amoore kawotu biittaa laattidosona.

English Sentences: And all the plain on this side Jordan eastward, even unto the sea of the plain, under the springs of Pisgah.
Wolaitta Sentences: He biittai Arnnoona SHaafaa doonan de7iya Aaro7era katamaappe biidi, Siriyoone Deriyaa gakkees; he Siriyoone geetetti xeesettiya deree Hermmoone giyo deriyaa.

English Sentences: And Moses called all Israel, and said unto them, Hear, O Israel, the statutes and judgments which I speak in your ears this day, that ye may learn them, and keep, and do them.
Wolaitta Sentences: Qassikka he biittai Yorddaanoosappe arshsho baggaara de7iya Aaraba biittaa ubbaa ekkidi biidi, Pisgga Deriyaa xaphon de7iya Haiquwaa Abbaa gakkees.

English Sentences: The LORD our God made a covenant with us in Horeb.
Wolaitta Sentences: Muusee Israa7eela asaa ubbaa issippe xeesidi, hagaadan yaagiis; "Inttenoo Israa7eela asau, taani hachchi intteyyo yootiyo awaajuwaanne higgiyaa siyite; intte eta tamaaritenne minttidi oottite.

English Sentences: The LORD made not this covenant with our fathers, but with us, even us, who are all of us here alive this day.
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAI nu Xoossai Siinaa Deriyaa bollan nunaara maachchaa maacettiis.

English Sentences: The LORD talked with you face to face in the mount out of the midst of the fire,
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAI ha maachchaa maacettidoogee nu aawatu xallaara gidenna; hachchi de7uwan de7iya nu ubbaarakka maacettiis.

English Sentences: (I stood between the LORD and you at that time, to shew you the word of the LORD: for ye were afraid by reason of the fire, and went not up into the mount;) saying,
Wolaitta Sentences: He deriyaa bollan eexxiya tamaa giddon gididi, GODAI intte baazzan eqqidi inttenaara haasayiis.

English Sentences: I am the LORD thy God, which brought thee out of the land of Egypt, from the house of bondage.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taanikka he wode GODAI giyoobaa intteyyo yootanau, GODAAPPENNE intteppe gidduwan eqqaas; aissi giikko, intte tamau yayyidi, deriyaa pude kiyibeekketa. GODAIKKA hagaadan yaagiis.

English Sentences: Thou shalt have none other gods before me.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Gibxxe biittaappe ailletettaa keettaappe nena wozidaagee taani GODAA ne Xoossaa.

English Sentences: Thou shalt not make thee any graven image, or any likeness of any thing that is in heaven above, or that is in the earth beneath, or that is in the waters beneath the earth:
Wolaitta Sentences: "Taappe attin, hara xoossati neeyyo de7oppona.

English Sentences: Thou shalt not bow down thyself unto them, nor serve them: for I the LORD thy God am a jealous God, visiting the iniquity of the fathers upon the children unto the third and fourth generation of them that hate me,
Wolaitta Sentences: "Bolla saluwan de7iyaaba gidin, woikko garssa sa7an de7iyaaba gidin, woikko sa7aappe garssaara de7iya haattaa giddon de7iyaabaa gidinkka, aiba misiliyaanne neeyyo eeqa oottoppa.

English Sentences: And shewing mercy unto thousands of them that love me and keep my commandments.
Wolaitta Sentences: Neeni etau hokkoppa; woikko etau goinnoppa; aissi giikko, taani tana ixxiyaageeta aawatu nagaraa gishshau, naata heezzanttanne oidantta yeletaa gakkanaassi qaxxayiyaagaa; taani, GODAI ne Xoossai qanaatiya Xoossaattenne.

English Sentences: Thou shalt not take the name of the LORD thy God in vain: for the LORD will not hold him guiltless that taketh his name in vain.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin taani tana siiqiyaageetanne ta azazuwaa naagiyaageeta sha7u yeletaa gakkanaassi ta aggenna siiquwaa bessais.

English Sentences: Keep the sabbath day to sanctify it, as the LORD thy God hath commanded thee.
Wolaitta Sentences: "GODAA ne Xoossaa sunttaa hadan xeesoppa; aissi giikko, GODAI ba sunttaa hadan xeesiyaagaa qaxxayennan aggenna.

English Sentences: Six days thou shalt labour, and do all thy work:
Wolaitta Sentences: "GODAI ne Xoossai nena azazidoogaadan, geeshsha oottada Sambbata gallassaa naaga.

English Sentences: But the seventh day is the sabbath of the LORD thy God: in it thou shalt not do any work, thou, nor thy son, nor thy daughter, nor thy manservant, nor thy maidservant, nor thine ox, nor thine ass, nor any of thy cattle, nor thy stranger that is within thy gates; that thy manservant and thy maidservant may rest as well as thou.
Wolaitta Sentences: Neeni oottiyo ooso ubbaa usuppun gallassan ootta.

English Sentences: And remember that thou wast a servant in the land of Egypt, and that the LORD thy God brought thee out thence through a mighty hand and by a stretched out arm: therefore the LORD thy God commanded thee to keep the sabbath day.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin laappuntta gallassai GODAAYYO, ne Xoossaayyo Sambbata. He gallassi ai oosonne oottoppa; neeni woikko ne attuma na7ai, woikko ne macca na7iyaa, woikko ne ashkkarai, woikko ne ashkkariyaa, woikko ne boorai, woikko ne haree, woikko ne hara meheti, woikko ne kataman de7iya betee, he gallassi aiba oosonne oottoppite. Neeni shemppiyoogaadan ne attumanne macca ashkkaratikka shemppona.

English Sentences: Honour thy father and thy mother, as the LORD thy God hath commanded thee; that thy days may be prolonged, and that it may go well with thee, in the land which the LORD thy God giveth thee.
Wolaitta Sentences: Neeni Gibxxe biittan aille gidada de7idoogaa dogoppa; qassi GODAI ne Xoossai ba wolqqaama kushiyaaninne ba micettida qesiyan yaappe nena kessidoogaa dogoppa. GODAI ne Xoossai Sambbata gallassaa neeni naaganaadan, nena azazidoogeekka hegaa gishshaassa.

English Sentences: Thou shalt not kill.
Wolaitta Sentences: "GODAI ne Xoossai neeyyo immiyo biittan ne baree aduqqana malanne neeyyo lo77ana mala, GODAI ne Xoossai nena azazidoogaadan, ne aawaanne ne aayyiyo bonchcha.

English Sentences: Neither shalt thou commit adultery.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Asa woroppa.

English Sentences: Neither shalt thou steal.
Wolaitta Sentences: "SHaaramuxoppa.

English Sentences: Neither shalt thou bear false witness against thy neighbour.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Wuuqqoppa.

English Sentences: Neither shalt thou desire thy neighbour's wife, neither shalt thou covet thy neighbour's house, his field, or his manservant, or his maidservant, his ox, or his ass, or any thing that is thy neighbour's.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Ne shooruwaa bollan wordduwaa markkattoppa.

English Sentences: These words the LORD spake unto all your assembly in the mount out of the midst of the fire, of the cloud, and of the thick darkness, with a great voice: and he added no more. And he wrote them in two tables of stone, and delivered them unto me.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Ne shooruwaa machchiyo amottoppa; a keettaa, a shooqaa, a attuma askkaraa, woikko a macca ashkkariyo, woikko a booraa, woikko a hariyaa, woikko ayyo de7iyaabaa aibanne amottoppa yaagiis.

English Sentences: And it came to pass, when ye heard the voice out of the midst of the darkness, (for the mountain did burn with fire,) that ye came near unto me, even all the heads of your tribes, and your elders;
Wolaitta Sentences: "Deriyaa bollan tamaa giddoppe, shaaraa giddoppenne gorddida xumaa giddoppe GODAI xoqqu giida cenggurssan yaa7a ubbaayyo yootido qaalati hageeta; i eta bollan aibanne gujjibeenna. Qassi eta i naa77u masettida shuchchatu bolli xaafidi, taayyo immiis.

English Sentences: And ye said, Behold, the LORD our God hath shewed us his glory and his greatness, and we have heard his voice out of the midst of the fire: we have seen this day that God doth talk with man, and he liveth.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Deree taman xuugettishin, xumaa giddoppe cenggurssaa intte siyido wode, intte zariyaa halaqatinne intte cimati taakko yiidi,

English Sentences: Now therefore why should we die? for this great fire will consume us: if we hear the voice of the LORD our God any more, then we shall die.
Wolaitta Sentences: hagaadan yaagideta; Be7a, nuuni GODAA nu Xoossaa cenggurssaa tamaa giddoppe siyido wode, GODAI nu Xoossai ba bonchchuwaanne ba anggaa nuna bessiis. Qassi nuuni Xoossai aara haasayinkka asi de7uwan de7anau danddayiyoogaa hachchi be7ida.

English Sentences: For who is there of all flesh, that hath heard the voice of the living God speaking out of the midst of the fire, as we have, and lived?
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin ha wolqqaama tamai nuna xaissanau danddayees; yaatin, nuuni aissi haiqqiyoonii? GODAA nu Xoossaa qaalaa nuuni naa77antto siyikko, nuuni haiqqoos.

English Sentences: Go thou near, and hear all that the LORD our God shall say: and speak thou unto us all that the LORD our God shall speak unto thee; and we will hear it, and do it.
Wolaitta Sentences: Aissi giikko, asho maayidaban, nuuni siyidoogaadan tamaa giddon gididi haasayishin, de7o Xoossaa qaalaa siyidi, paxa de7ida asi oonee?

English Sentences: And the LORD heard the voice of your words, when ye spake unto me; and the LORD said unto me, I have heard the voice of the words of this people, which they have spoken unto thee: they have well said all that they have spoken.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaa gishshau, Muusee! Neeni shiiqada, GODAI nu Xoossai giyoobaa ubbaa siya; siyada GODAI nu Xoossai neeyyo yootiyoobaa ubbaa neeni nuuyyo yoota; nuunikka siyidi oottana yaagideta.

English Sentences: O that there were such an heart in them, that they would fear me, and keep all my commandments always, that it might be well with them, and with their children for ever!
Wolaitta Sentences: "Intte taayyo haasayishin, GODAI intte giyoogaa siyidi, tana hagaadan yaagiis; Ha asai neeyyo yootidobaa ubbaa siyaas; eti giidobaa ubbaa likke giidosona.

English Sentences: Go say to them, Get you into your tents again.
Wolaitta Sentences: Etayyoonne eta naatuyyo merinau ubbabai lo77o gidanaadan, taayyo yayyanaunne ta azazota naaganau etau ubbatookka hagaa mala wozanai de7i erenneeshsha!

English Sentences: But as for thee, stand thou here by me, and I will speak unto thee all the commandments, and the statutes, and the judgments, which thou shalt teach them, that they may do them in the land which I give them to possess it.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ha77i neeni baada, eti bantta dunkkaaniyau simmanaadan yoota.

English Sentences: Ye shall observe to do therefore as the LORD your God hath commanded you: ye shall not turn aside to the right hand or to the left.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin neeni hagan ta matan eqqashsha; eti laattanaadan taani etau immiyo biittan eti oottana mala, neeni eta tamaarissana ta azazuwaa, ta awaajuwaanne ta higgiyaa ubbaa taani neeyyo yootana yaagiis.

English Sentences: Ye shall walk in all the ways which the LORD your God hath commanded you, that ye may live, and that it may be well with you, and that ye may prolong your days in the land which ye shall possess.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Inttenoo Israa7eela asau, yaakko GODAI intte Xoossai inttena azazidobaa ubbaa oottanau naagettite; appe ushachchi woi haddirssi gooppite.

English Sentences: Now these are the commandments, the statutes, and the judgments, which the LORD your God commanded to teach you, that ye might do them in the land whither ye go to possess it:
Wolaitta Sentences: Intte de7uwan de7ana mala, ubbabai intteyyo injjetana mala, qassi intte laattiyo biittankka intte aduqqidi de7ana mala, GODAI intte Xoossai inttena azazido oge ubban hemettite.

English Sentences: That thou mightest fear the LORD thy God, to keep all his statutes and his commandments, which I command thee, thou, and thy son, and thy son's son, all the days of thy life; and that thy days may be prolonged.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Intte laattanau biyo biittan intte oottanaadan taani inttena tamaarissana mala, GODAI intte Xoossai tana azazido azazoti awaajotinne higgeti hageeta.

English Sentences: Hear therefore, O Israel, and observe to do it; that it may be well with thee, and that ye may increase mightily, as the LORD God of thy fathers hath promised thee, in the land that floweth with milk and honey.
Wolaitta Sentences: Intte laittai adussa gidana mala, intte, intte naatinne intte naatu naatikka taani hachchi inttena azaziyo GODAA awaajuwaanne higgiyaa naagiyoogan intte laittan ubban GODAASSI, intte Xoossaassi yayyite.

English Sentences: Hear, O Israel: The LORD our God is one LORD:
Wolaitta Sentences: Inttenoo Israa7eela asau, ubbabai intteyyo lo77o gidanaadaaninne GODAI, intte aawatu Xoossai, intteyyo giidoogaadan, maattaanne eessaa goggiya biittan intte keehi corattanaadan, ha higgeta siyitenne minttidi oottite.

English Sentences: And thou shalt love the LORD thy God with all thine heart, and with all thy soul, and with all thy might.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Nenoo Israa7eelaa, siya; GODAI nu Xoossai issi GODAA.

English Sentences: And these words, which I command thee this day, shall be in thine heart:
Wolaitta Sentences: Neeni GODAA ne Xoossaa ne kumetta wozanaappe, ne kumetta shemppuwaappenne ne kumetta wolqqaappe siiqa.

English Sentences: And thou shalt teach them diligently unto thy children, and shalt talk of them when thou sittest in thine house, and when thou walkest by the way, and when thou liest down, and when thou risest up.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hachchi taani nena azaziyo ha azazota ne wozanan wotta.

English Sentences: And thou shalt bind them for a sign upon thine hand, and they shall be as frontlets between thine eyes.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eta neeni ne naata tamaarissa; neeni ne son uttiyo wode, ogiyan hemettiyo wode, zin77iyo wodenne denddiyo wodekka etabaa haasaya.

English Sentences: And thou shalt write them upon the posts of thy house, and on thy gates.
Wolaitta Sentences: Malaata oottada ne kushiyan eta qachcha; qassi ne som77uwankka malaatadan wotta.

English Sentences: And it shall be, when the LORD thy God shall have brought thee into the land which he sware unto thy fathers, to Abraham, to Isaac, and to Jacob, to give thee great and goodly cities, which thou buildedst not,
Wolaitta Sentences: Ne penggiyaa qosilettaa bollaaninne ne dirssaa penggiyaa bollan neeni eta xaafa.

English Sentences: And houses full of all good things, which thou filledst not, and wells digged, which thou diggedst not, vineyards and olive trees, which thou plantedst not; when thou shalt have eaten and be full;
Wolaitta Sentences: "GODAI intte Xoossai intteyyo immana giidi intte aawatuyyo, Abrahaamayyo, Yisaaqayyoonne Yaaqoobayyo caaqqido, intte keexxibeenna gitanne lo77o katamati kumido biittaa immana.

English Sentences: Then beware lest thou forget the LORD, which brought thee forth out of the land of Egypt, from the house of bondage.
Wolaitta Sentences: Intte kunttibeenna duretai kumido keettata, intte bookkibeenna ollata, intte tokkibeenna woinetanne zaitiyaa wogarata intteyyo immiyo wode, inttekka miidi kallido wode,

English Sentences: Thou shalt fear the LORD thy God, and serve him, and shalt swear by his name.
Wolaitta Sentences: inttena Gibxxeppe, ailletettaa biittaappe kessida GODAA dogennaadan naagettite.

English Sentences: Ye shall not go after other gods, of the gods of the people which are round about you;
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAAYYO, intte Xoossaayyo, yayyite; a xallaayyo goinnite; a sunttankka caaqqite.

English Sentences: (For the LORD thy God is a jealous God among you) lest the anger of the LORD thy God be kindled against thee, and destroy thee from off the face of the earth.
Wolaitta Sentences: Intte yuushuwan de7iya asai goinniyo hara xoossatuyyo goinnoppite.

English Sentences: Ye shall not tempt the LORD your God, as ye tempted him in Massah.
Wolaitta Sentences: Aissi giikko, intte giddon de7iya GODAI intte Xoossai qanaatiya Xoossa; a hanqqoi intte bollan eexxi kiyana; i inttena biittaa bollappekka quccidi xaissana.

English Sentences: Ye shall diligently keep the commandments of the LORD your God, and his testimonies, and his statutes, which he hath commanded thee.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Masaahan intte a paaccidoogaadan, GODAA intte Xoossaa paaccoppite.

English Sentences: And thou shalt do that which is right and good in the sight of the LORD: that it may be well with thee, and that thou mayest go in and possess the good land which the LORD sware unto thy fathers,
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAI intte Xoossai inttena azazido a azazota, a wogatanne a awaajota minttidi naagite.

English Sentences: To cast out all thine enemies from before thee, as the LORD hath spoken.
Wolaitta Sentences: Intteyyo ubbabai lo77o gidana mala, GODAA sinttan intte likkebaanne lo77obaa oottite. Yaatikko, intteyyo immanau GODAI intte aawatuyyo caaqqido, he lo77o biittaa intte laattana.

English Sentences: And when thy son asketh thee in time to come, saying, What mean the testimonies, and the statutes, and the judgments, which the LORD our God hath commanded you?
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAI ba giidoogaadan intte morkketa ubbaa intte sinttappe yedettana.

English Sentences: Then thou shalt say unto thy son, We were Pharaoh's bondmen in Egypt; and the LORD brought us out of Egypt with a mighty hand:
Wolaitta Sentences: "Sinttappe intte naati, GODAI nu Xoossai inttena azazido ha wogaa, awaajuwaanne higgiyaa birshshettai aibee? yaagidi inttena oichchiyo wode,

English Sentences: And the LORD shewed signs and wonders, great and sore, upon Egypt, upon Pharaoh, and upon all his household, before our eyes:
Wolaitta Sentences: intte etau hagaadan yaagidi zaarite; Nuuni Gibxxe biittan Gibxxe kawuwaa ailleta; shin GODAI ba mino kushiyan nuna Gibxxeppe kessiis.

English Sentences: And he brought us out from thence, that he might bring us in, to give us the land which he sware unto our fathers.
Wolaitta Sentences: Qassi GODAI nu xeellishin, Gibxxe biittaa bollan, Gibxxe kawuwaa bollaaninne a sunttatu ubbaa bollan gitanne yashshiya malaatatanne maalaalissiyaabata oottiis.

English Sentences: And the LORD commanded us to do all these statutes, to fear the LORD our God, for our good always, that he might preserve us alive, as it is at this day.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin i nu maizza aawatuyyo immana giidi caaqqido biittaa nuna gelissidi, nuuyyo immanau nuna Gibxxeppe kessiis.

English Sentences: And it shall be our righteousness, if we observe to do all these commandments before the LORD our God, as he hath commanded us.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaatidi hachchi be7iyoogaadan, nuuyyo ubba wodekka lo77o gidana malanne nuuni de7uwan de7ana mala, GODAI nuna ha awaajota ubbaa naaganaadaaninne GODAASSI, nu Xoossaassi, yayyanaadan azaziis.

English Sentences: When the LORD thy God shall bring thee into the land whither thou goest to possess it, and hath cast out many nations before thee, the Hittites, and the Girgashites, and the Amorites, and the Canaanites, and the Perizzites, and the Hivites, and the Jebusites, seven nations greater and mightier than thou;
Wolaitta Sentences: I nuna azazidoogaadan, GODAA, nu Xoossaa, sinttan ha azazota ubbaa minttidi naagikko, hegee nuuyyo xillotetta gidana yaagite.

English Sentences: And when the LORD thy God shall deliver them before thee; thou shalt smite them, and utterly destroy them; thou shalt make no covenant with them, nor shew mercy unto them:
Wolaitta Sentences: "GODAI intte Xoossai intte laattanau biyo biittaa inttena gelissiyo wodenne, qassi intteppe wolqqaamiyaanne minniya laappun kawotettata, hegeetikka Hiiteta, Gerggeeseta, Amooreta, Kanaaneta, Parzzeta, Hiiwetanne Yaabuusata intte sinttappe xoqolliyo wode,

English Sentences: Neither shalt thou make marriages with them; thy daughter thou shalt not give unto his son, nor his daughter shalt thou take unto thy son.
Wolaitta Sentences: etakka GODAI intte Xoossai intte kushiyan aatti immin, intte eta xooniyo wode, eta muleera suppu oottidi xaissite. Etaara aiba maachchanne maacettoppite. Etau ainne qarettoppite.

English Sentences: For they will turn away thy son from following me, that they may serve other gods: so will the anger of the LORD be kindled against you, and destroy thee suddenly.
Wolaitta Sentences: Intte etaara ekettoppitenne gelettoppite. Intte macca naata eta attuma naatuyyo immoppite. Woikko eta macca naatakka intte attuma naatuyyo ekkoppite.

English Sentences: But thus shall ye deal with them; ye shall destroy their altars, and break down their images, and cut down their groves, and burn their graven images with fire.
Wolaitta Sentences: Aissi giikko, eti intte naata tana kaalliyoosaappe hara eeqatuyyo goinnanaadan, wora zaarana. He wode GODAA hanqqoi intte bolli eexxi kiyana; inttenakka sohuwaara xaissi bayana.

English Sentences: For thou art an holy people unto the LORD thy God: the LORD thy God hath chosen thee to be a special people unto himself, above all people that are upon the face of the earth.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaa gishshau, eti yarshshiyoosaa kolite. Eti goinniyo shuchchata mentterettite. Asheero giyo macca xoossee misiliyaa kinchcherettite; eta masettida misiletakka taman xuuggite.

English Sentences: The LORD did not set his love upon you, nor choose you, because ye were more in number than any people; for ye were the fewest of all people:
Wolaitta Sentences: Aissi giikko, intte GODAAYYO, intte Xoossaayyo, geeshsha asa. GODAI intte Xoossai inttena baayyo dumma asa oottidi, biittaa bollan de7iya asa ubbaappe dooriis.

English Sentences: But because the LORD loved you, and because he would keep the oath which he had sworn unto your fathers, hath the LORD brought you out with a mighty hand, and redeemed you out of the house of bondmen, from the hand of Pharaoh king of Egypt.
Wolaitta Sentences: "GODAI inttena siiqidoogeenne dooridoogee intte hara asaappe qoodan darido gishshassa gidenna. Intte hara asa ubbaappekka qoodan guuxxiyaageeta.

English Sentences: Know therefore that the LORD thy God, he is God, the faithful God, which keepeth covenant and mercy with them that love him and keep his commandments to a thousand generations;
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin GODAI inttena siiqido gishshaunne intte maizza aawatuyyo caaqqido caaquwaa naagido gishshau, i inttena ailletettaa biittaappe, Gibxxe kawuwaa kushiyaappe, ba wolqqaama kushiyan kessiisinne woziis.

English Sentences: And repayeth them that hate him to their face, to destroy them: he will not be slack to him that hateth him, he will repay him to his face.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaa gishshau, GODAI intte Xoossai Xoossaa gidiyoogaa erite. I bana siiqiyaageetuyyoonne ba azazuwaa naagiyaageetuyyo sha7u yeletaa gakkanaashin, ba aggenna siiquwaa maachchaa naagiya, ammanettiya Xoossaa.

English Sentences: Thou shalt therefore keep the commandments, and the statutes, and the judgments, which I command thee this day, to do them.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin i bana ixxiyaageetuyyo eta tal77iyaa zaarees; i eta tal77iyaa zaaranau gam77enna.

English Sentences: Wherefore it shall come to pass, if ye hearken to these judgments, and keep, and do them, that the LORD thy God shall keep unto thee the covenant and the mercy which he sware unto thy fathers:
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaa gishshau, taani hachchi intteyyo immiyo azazota, awaajotanne higgeta naagite.

English Sentences: And he will love thee, and bless thee, and multiply thee: he will also bless the fruit of thy womb, and the fruit of thy land, thy corn, and thy wine, and thine oil, the increase of thy kine, and the flocks of thy sheep, in the land which he sware unto thy fathers to give thee.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Intte ha azazota siyidi, eta mintti naagikko, GODAI intte Xoossai intte maizza aawatuyyo caaqqidoogaadan, ba aggenna siiquwaa maachchaa intteyyo naagana.

English Sentences: Thou shalt be blessed above all people: there shall not be male or female barren among you, or among your cattle.
Wolaitta Sentences: I inttena siiqana; inttena anjjana; intte qoodaa darissana. Qassi i intteyyo immanau intte maizza aawatuyyo caaqqido biittan intte uluwaa aifiyaa, intte biittaa aifiyaa, kattaa, woiniyaa, zaitiyaa, intte mehiyaa maratanne intte dorssaa marata corissidi anjjana.

English Sentences: And the LORD will take away from thee all sickness, and will put none of the evil diseases of Egypt, which thou knowest, upon thee; but will lay them upon all them that hate thee.
Wolaitta Sentences: Intte hara ai asappenne aadhdhidi anjjettidaageeta gidana. Issoinne attuma gidin, macca gidin mainenna. Intte meheekka mainenna.

English Sentences: And thou shalt consume all the people which the LORD thy God shall deliver thee; thine eye shall have no pity upon them: neither shalt thou serve their gods; for that will be a snare unto thee.
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAI hargge ubbaappe inttena naagana. Intte eriyo Gibxxe biittaa iita harggiyaa intte bolli eheenna; shin i inttena ixxiya ubbaa bollan he harggiyaa ehaana.

English Sentences: If thou shalt say in thine heart, These nations are more than I; how can I dispossess them?
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAI intte Xoossai intteyyo aatti immiyo asa ubbaa xaissite; etayyo ainne qarettoppite. Eta xoossatuyyookka goinnoppite. Aissi giikko, hegee intteyyo pire gidana.

English Sentences: Thou shalt not be afraid of them: but shalt well remember what the LORD thy God did unto Pharaoh, and unto all Egypt;
Wolaitta Sentences: "Intte intte wozanan, Ha kawotettati nuuppe minnoosona; yaatin, nuuni eta waatidi yedetti kessanee? gaanau danddayeeta.
