Wolaitta Sentences: "GODAA sinttan tuna gididabaa, kushe hiillanchchi massidi kessido mittaa gidin, woikko birataa tigido medhdhido eeqaa gidin, ayyo geeman goinniya asi qanggettidaagaa gido yaagin, asai ubbai, Amin77i! yaago.

English Sentences: Cursed be he that removeth his neighbour's landmark. And all the people shall say, Amen.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Ba aawaa woikko ba aayyiyo kaushshiya asi qanggettidaagaa gido yaagin, asai ubbai, Amin77i! yaago.

English Sentences: Cursed be he that maketh the blind to wander out of the way. And all the people shall say, Amen.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Ba shooruwaa zawaa sugiya asi qanggettidaagaa gido yaagin, asai ubbai, Amin77i! yaago.

English Sentences: Cursed be he that perverteth the judgment of the stranger, fatherless, and widow. And all the people shall say, Amen.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Qooqiyaa baanau bessiya ogiyaappe balasaa zaariya asi qanggettidaagaa gido yaagin, asai ubbai, Amin77i! yaago.

English Sentences: Cursed be he that lieth with his father's wife; because he uncovereth his father's skirt. And all the people shall say, Amen.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Betiyaa, aaya aawu bainna naatu pirddaanne am77ee pirddaa geellayiya asi qanggettidaagaa gido yaagin, asai ubbai, Amin77i yaago.

English Sentences: Cursed be he that lieth with any manner of beast. And all the people shall say, Amen.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Ba aawaa machcheera zin77idi, ba aawaa bonchchuwaa kaushshiya asi qanggettidaagaa gido yaagin, asai ubbai, Amin77i! yaago.

English Sentences: Cursed be he that lieth with his sister, the daughter of his father, or the daughter of his mother. And all the people shall say, Amen.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Ai meheerakka zin77iya asi qanggettidaagaa gido yaagin, asai ubbai, Amin77i! yaago.

English Sentences: Cursed be he that lieth with his mother in law. And all the people shall say, Amen.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Ba michchiyo gidiya, aawaa na7eera gidin, ba aayee na7eera zin77iya asi qanggettidaagaa gido yaagin, asai ubbai, Amin77i! yaago.

English Sentences: Cursed be he that smiteth his neighbour secretly. And all the people shall say, Amen.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Ba bolloteera zin77iya asi qanggettidaagaa gido yaagin, asai ubbai, Amin77i! yaago.

English Sentences: Cursed be he that taketh reward to slay an innocent person. And all the people shall say, Amen.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Ba shooruwaa geeman woriya asi qanggettidaagaa gido yaagin, asai ubbai, Amin77i! yaago.

English Sentences: Cursed be he that confirmeth not all the words of this law to do them. And all the people shall say, Amen.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Miishshan shamettidi, xillo asa woriya asi qanggettidaagaa gido yaagin, asai ubbai, Amin77i! yaago.

English Sentences: And it shall come to pass, if thou shalt hearken diligently unto the voice of the LORD thy God, to observe and to do all his commandments which I command thee this day, that the LORD thy God will set thee on high above all nations of the earth:
Wolaitta Sentences: "Ha higgiyaa qaalata polidi minttenna asi qanggettidaagaa gido yaagin, asai ubbai, Amin77i! yaago.

English Sentences: And all these blessings shall come on thee, and overtake thee, if thou shalt hearken unto the voice of the LORD thy God.
Wolaitta Sentences: "GODAAYYO, ne Xoossaayyo, polo azazettikko, hachchi taani neeyyo immiyo azazo ubbaa minttada kaallikko, GODAI ne Xoossai biittan de7iya kawotettatu ubbaappe nena xoqqu xoqqu oottana.

English Sentences: Blessed shalt thou be in the city, and blessed shalt thou be in the field.
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAAYYO, ne Xoossaayyo, neeni azazettikko, hagaappe kaallidi de7iya anjjoi ubbai neebaa gidana.

English Sentences: Blessed shall be the fruit of thy body, and the fruit of thy ground, and the fruit of thy cattle, the increase of thy kine, and the flocks of thy sheep.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Neeni kataman anjjettidaagaa gidana; gaxariyankka anjjettidaagaa gidana.

English Sentences: Blessed shall be thy basket and thy store.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ne uluwaa aifee, ne shooqaa aifee, ne mehiyaa maratinne ne dorssaanne ne deeshshaa wudiyaa marati corattidi anjjettidaageeta gidana.

English Sentences: Blessed shalt thou be when thou comest in, and blessed shalt thou be when thou goest out.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ne kattaa keesheenne ne munaqa keree anjjettidaageeta gidana.

English Sentences: The LORD shall cause thine enemies that rise up against thee to be smitten before thy face: they shall come out against thee one way, and flee before thee seven ways.
Wolaitta Sentences: Neeni gelaiddakka kiyaiddakka anjjettidaagaa gidana.

English Sentences: The LORD shall command the blessing upon thee in thy storehouses, and in all that thou settest thine hand unto; and he shall bless thee in the land which the LORD thy God giveth thee.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Ne bollan denddiya ne morkketa GODAI ne sinttan xoonettidaageeta oottana. Eti ne bolli issi ogiyaara yaana; shin laappun ogiyaara ne sinttappe baqatidi xayana.

English Sentences: The LORD shall establish thee an holy people unto himself, as he hath sworn unto thee, if thou shalt keep the commandments of the LORD thy God, and walk in his ways.
Wolaitta Sentences: "GODAI ne kushee oiqqidobaa ubbaanne ne gootaraa anjjana; GODAI ne Xoossai neeyyo i immiyo biittan nena anjjana.

English Sentences: And all people of the earth shall see that thou art called by the name of the LORD; and they shall be afraid of thee.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Neeni GODAA ne Xoossaa azazuwaa naagikkonne a ogiyan hemettikko, i neeyyo kase caaqqidoogaadan, GODAI nena baayyo dummatida geeshsha dere oottidi essana.

English Sentences: And the LORD shall make thee plenteous in goods, in the fruit of thy body, and in the fruit of thy cattle, and in the fruit of thy ground, in the land which the LORD sware unto thy fathers to give thee.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaappe guyyiyan, biittan de7iya asai ubbai GODAA sunttai nenan xeegettidoogaa be7idi yayyana.

English Sentences: The LORD shall open unto thee his good treasure, the heaven to give the rain unto thy land in his season, and to bless all the work of thine hand: and thou shalt lend unto many nations, and thou shalt not borrow.
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAI neeyyo immanau kase ne maizza aawatuyyo caaqqido he biittan, ne uluwaa aifiyaa, ne mehiyaa aifiyaanne, ne shooqaa aifiyaa darissidi nena anjjana.

English Sentences: And the LORD shall make thee the head, and not the tail; and thou shalt be above only, and thou shalt not be beneath; if that thou hearken unto the commandments of the LORD thy God, which I command thee this day, to observe and to do them:
Wolaitta Sentences: "Ne kushiyaa oosuwaa ubbaa anjjanaunne, GODAI ne biittaassi iraa wodiyan bukissanau ba minjja keettaa, saluwaa penggiyaa neeyyo dooyana; qassi neeni daro kawotettatussi tal77anappe attin, ooppenne haa tal77akka.

English Sentences: And thou shalt not go aside from any of the words which I command thee this day, to the right hand, or to the left, to go after other gods to serve them.
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAI nena huuphe kessanappe attin, guyye goina kessenna. Hachchi taani neeyyo immiyo, GODAA ne Xoossaa azazuwaa siyada, hegaa minttada kaallikko, neena bolla gidanappe attin, garssa gedakka.

English Sentences: But it shall come to pass, if thou wilt not hearken unto the voice of the LORD thy God, to observe to do all his commandments and his statutes which I command thee this day; that all these curses shall come upon thee, and overtake thee:
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani neeyyo hachchi immido azazuwaappe haddirssinne ushachchi gaada, hara xoossata kaalloppanne etau oottoppa.

English Sentences: Cursed shalt thou be in the city, and cursed shalt thou be in the field.
Wolaitta Sentences: "SHin neeni GODAA ne Xoossaa qaalaayyo azazettennan ixxada, hachchi taani nena azaziyo wogaanne azazuwaa ubbaa naagennan aggikko, hagaappe kaallidi de7iya qanggettati ubbai ne bolli yaananne nena eti demmana.

English Sentences: Cursed shall be thy basket and thy store.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Neeni kataman qanggettidaagaa gidana; gaxariyankka neeni qanggettidaagaa gidana.

English Sentences: Cursed shall be the fruit of thy body, and the fruit of thy land, the increase of thy kine, and the flocks of thy sheep.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Ne kattaa keesheenne ne munaqa keree qanggettidaagaa gidana.

English Sentences: Cursed shalt thou be when thou comest in, and cursed shalt thou be when thou goest out.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Ne uluwaa aifee, ne shooqaa aifee, ne marainne ne aayee, ne dorssaanne deeshshaa wudee qanggettidaagaa gidana.

English Sentences: The LORD shall send upon thee cursing, vexation, and rebuke, in all that thou settest thine hand unto for to do, until thou be destroyed, and until thou perish quickly; because of the wickedness of thy doings, whereby thou hast forsaken me.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Neeni gelaiddakka kiyaiddakka qanggettidaagaa gidana.

English Sentences: The LORD shall make the pestilence cleave unto thee, until he have consumed thee from off the land, whither thou goest to possess it.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Neeni ne iita oosuwan tana aggido gishshau, eesuwan neeni xayana gakkanaashin, ne oottiyo ooso ubban GODAI qanggettaa, shabbirssaanne seeraa yeddana.

English Sentences: The LORD shall smite thee with a consumption, and with a fever, and with an inflammation, and with an extreme burning, and with the sword, and with blasting, and with mildew; and they shall pursue thee until thou perish.
Wolaitta Sentences: Neeni laattanau biyo biittaappe xayana gakkanaashin, GODAI boshai neeppe duuxxennaadan oottana.

English Sentences: And thy heaven that is over thy head shall be brass, and the earth that is under thee shall be iron.
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAI nena gilqqatettan, mishuwaaninne masunttan, xuuggiya awaaninne koshan, carkkuwaaninne dumma dumma kattaa harggiyan neeni xayana gakkanaashin shocana.

English Sentences: The LORD shall make the rain of thy land powder and dust: from heaven shall it come down upon thee, until thou be destroyed.
Wolaitta Sentences: Neeppe bollaara ne ginan de7iya saloi nahaase birata gidana; ne biittaikka birata gidana.

English Sentences: The LORD shall cause thee to be smitten before thine enemies: thou shalt go out one way against them, and flee seven ways before them: and shalt be removed into all the kingdoms of the earth.
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAI ne biittan bukkiya iraa buhenne baana kessana; neeni biittaappe xayana gakkanaashin, baanai saluwaappe duge bukkana.

English Sentences: And thy carcase shall be meat unto all fowls of the air, and unto the beasts of the earth, and no man shall fray them away.
Wolaitta Sentences: "GODAI nena ne morkketun xoonissana; neeni eta olanau issi ogiyaara kiyana; shin laappun ogiyaara ne eta sinttappe baqatana. Biittan de7iya kawotetta ubbai ne bolli gakkidabaa be7idi, yashshan shabbirettana.

English Sentences: The LORD will smite thee with the botch of Egypt, and with the emerods, and with the scab, and with the itch, whereof thou canst not be healed.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ne ahai saluwaa kafo ubbaunne bazzo do7au quma gidana; eta yedettiyaabikka de7enna.

English Sentences: The LORD shall smite thee with madness, and blindness, and astonishment of heart:
Wolaitta Sentences: "GODAI nena xalee bainna Gibxxe masunttan, kixan, ilaaninne puusuwan nena harggissana.

English Sentences: And thou shalt grope at noonday, as the blind gropeth in darkness, and thou shalt not prosper in thy ways: and thou shalt be only oppressed and spoiled evermore, and no man shall save thee.
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAI nena gooshshan, qooqetettaaninne dagaman shocana.

English Sentences: Thou shalt betroth a wife, and another man shall lie with her: thou shalt build an house, and thou shalt not dwell therein: thou shalt plant a vineyard, and shalt not gather the grapes thereof.
Wolaitta Sentences: Gallassa seetan neeni qooqee xuman tattaafiyoogaadan tattaafana; ne oottiyoobai ubbai neeyyo giigennan ixxana. Ne de7o laitta ubban huqqunnettadanne bonqqettada daana. Nena maaddiya asakka demmakka.

English Sentences: Thine ox shall be slain before thine eyes, and thou shalt not eat thereof: thine ass shall be violently taken away from before thy face, and shall not be restored to thee: thy sheep shall be given unto thine enemies, and thou shalt have none to rescue them.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Neeni macca na7a giigissana shin, harai o dafidi efaana. Keettaa neeni keexxana; shin an de7akka. Woiniyaa ne tokkana; shin a aifiyaa maakka.

English Sentences: Thy sons and thy daughters shall be given unto another people, and thine eyes shall look, and fail with longing for them all the day long: and there shall be no might in thine hand:
Wolaitta Sentences: Ne boorai ne sinttan shukettana; shin a ashuwaa maakka. Ne haree neeppe bogettidi ekettana; shin neeyyo guyye simmenna. Ne dorssai ne morkkiyau imettana; hegaa ashshanau nena maaddiyaabi de7enna.

English Sentences: The fruit of thy land, and all thy labours, shall a nation which thou knowest not eat up; and thou shalt be only oppressed and crushed alway:
Wolaitta Sentences: Ne aifiyaa sinttan ne attuma naatinne macca naati hara kawotettau imettana; eti simmin be7ana gaada xeellishin, ne aifee galjjana; hegaa digganau neeyyo aiba wolqqinne de7enna.

English Sentences: So that thou shalt be mad for the sight of thine eyes which thou shalt see.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ne biittaa aifiyaanne ne daafuridobaa ubbaa ne erenna asai maana; ne de7o ubban huqqunnettidaagaanne naaqettidaagaa gidana.

English Sentences: The LORD shall smite thee in the knees, and in the legs, with a sore botch that cannot be healed, from the sole of thy foot unto the top of thy head.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ne be7iyo iitai nena gooshshana.

English Sentences: The LORD shall bring thee, and thy king which thou shalt set over thee, unto a nation which neither thou nor thy fathers have known; and there shalt thou serve other gods, wood and stone.
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAI xalee bainna iita masunttan ne gulbbataanne ne wodiraa harggissana; yedhdhiya gediyaappe huuphiyaa gakkanaashin, nena he masunttan shocana.

English Sentences: And thou shalt become an astonishment, a proverb, and a byword, among all nations whither the LORD shall lead thee.
Wolaitta Sentences: "GODAI nenanne ne kawuwaa, nena gidin, ne maizza aawata gidinkka eribeenna asa dere efaana. Hegan neeni mittaappenne shuchchaappe merettida hara xoossatuyyo goinnana.

English Sentences: Thou shalt carry much seed out into the field, and shalt gather but little in; for the locust shall consume it.
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAI nena laaliyo hara kawotettatu ubbaa giddon poora hageetubaa giidi, qilliicciyoobaanne baceessiyoobaa gidana.

English Sentences: Thou shalt plant vineyards, and dress them, but shalt neither drink of the wine, nor gather the grapes; for the worms shall eat them.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Neeni daro kattaa ne shooqan zerana; shin boolee mirggin, guutta kattaa shiishshana.

English Sentences: Thou shalt have olive trees throughout all thy coasts, but thou shalt not anoint thyself with the oil; for thine olive shall cast his fruit.
Wolaitta Sentences: Woiniyaa tokkada, a oottana; shin guxunee a mirggin, appe ainne maxakka; agadakka appe uyakka.

English Sentences: Thou shalt beget sons and daughters, but thou shalt not enjoy them; for they shall go into captivity.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ne biitta ubban zaitiyaa wogarai mokkana; shin aifee qoqqofettiichchin, wogaraa zaite demmakka.

English Sentences: All thy trees and fruit of thy land shall the locust consume.
Wolaitta Sentences: Attumanne macca naata ne yelana; shin olai omooddi efirggin, eti nenaara de7okkona.

English Sentences: The stranger that is within thee shall get up above thee very high; and thou shalt come down very low.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ne mitta ubbaanne ne biittaa aifiyaa boolee wurssana.

English Sentences: He shall lend to thee, and thou shalt not lend to him: he shall be the head, and thou shalt be the tail.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Ne giddon de7iya betee ne bolli xoqqu xoqqu gaana; shin neeni guyye yaada ziqqi ziqqi gaana.

English Sentences: Moreover all these curses shall come upon thee, and shall pursue thee, and overtake thee, till thou be destroyed; because thou hearkenedst not unto the voice of the LORD thy God, to keep his commandments and his statutes which he commanded thee:
Wolaitta Sentences: I neeyyo tal77anappe attin, neeni ayyo tal77akka; i huuphe gidana; neeni goina gidana.

English Sentences: And they shall be upon thee for a sign and for a wonder, and upon thy seed for ever.
Wolaitta Sentences: "GODAAYYO, ne Xoossaayyo, azazettennan ixxido gishshaunne i azazido azazuwaanne wogaa naagennan ixxido gishshau, neeni xayana gakkanaashin, ha qanggettati ubbai ne bolli wodhdhana; nena eti yedettana.

English Sentences: Because thou servedst not the LORD thy God with joyfulness, and with gladness of heart, for the abundance of all things;
Wolaitta Sentences: Ha qanggettati ne bollaaninne ne zaretu bollan merinau malaatanne maalaalissiyaaba gidana.

English Sentences: Therefore shalt thou serve thine enemies which the LORD shall send against thee, in hunger, and in thirst, and in nakedness, and in want of all things: and he shall put a yoke of iron upon thy neck, until he have destroyed thee.
Wolaitta Sentences: Neeyyo sa7ai injjetido wode, GODAU, ne Xoossau, ufaissaaninne galatan goinnabaakka.

English Sentences: The LORD shall bring a nation against thee from far, from the end of the earth, as swift as the eagle flieth; a nation whose tongue thou shalt not understand;
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaa gishshau, nena namisan, saamuwan, kalluwaaninne metuwan ubbabaa xayada, GODAI ne bolli yeddiyo ne morkketuyyo haarettana; GODAI nena xaissana gakkanaashin, ne morggiyan birata qambbaraa waaxana.

English Sentences: A nation of fierce countenance, which shall not regard the person of the old, nor shew favour to the young:
Wolaitta Sentences: "GODAI neeni eta qaalaa erenna kawotettaa ankkoi paalliyoogaadan eesoyiiddi, biittaa gaxaappe, haahuwaappe ne bolli ehaana.

English Sentences: And he shall eat the fruit of thy cattle, and the fruit of thy land, until thou be destroyed: which also shall not leave thee either corn, wine, or oil, or the increase of thy kine, or flocks of thy sheep, until he have destroyed thee.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti hanqqo som77uwaara de7iyaageeta; cimaa bonchchennaageeta; guuttatuyyookka qarettennaageeta.

English Sentences: And he shall besiege thee in all thy gates, until thy high and fenced walls come down, wherein thou trustedst, throughout all thy land: and he shall besiege thee in all thy gates throughout all thy land, which the LORD thy God hath given thee.
Wolaitta Sentences: Neeni xayana gakkanaashin, ne mehiyaa maraanne, ne biittaa aifiyaa maana. Eti neeni xayana gakkanaashin, ne kattaa, ne woiniyaa eessaa, ne zaitiyaa, ne miizzaanne ne dorssaa wudiyaa wurssana.

English Sentences: And thou shalt eat the fruit of thine own body, the flesh of thy sons and of thy daughters, which the LORD thy God hath given thee, in the siege, and in the straitness, wherewith thine enemies shall distress thee:
Wolaitta Sentences: Ne biittan de7iya neeni ammanettiyo, adussa, mino dirssati mulesaara kolettana gakkanaashin, ne katamaa yuushuwan dooddidi, nena un77ettana. GODAI ne Xoossai neeyyo immido biitta ubbaa yuushuwan dooddidi nena un77ettana.

English Sentences: So that the man that is tender among you, and very delicate, his eye shall be evil toward his brother, and toward the wife of his bosom, and toward the remnant of his children which he shall leave:
Wolaitta Sentences: "Ne morkketi katamaa dooddidi nena un77ettiyo wode, miyoobaa xayada, GODAI ne Xoossai neeyyo immido, ne uluwaa aife gidiya, ne attuma naatunne ne macca naatu ashuwaa neeni maana.

English Sentences: So that he will not give to any of them of the flesh of his children whom he shall eat: because he hath nothing left him in the siege, and in the straitness, wherewith thine enemies shall distress thee in all thy gates.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ne giddon harai atto kase injjiyan de7iis giyo asikka ba ishaassi, ba siiqiyo machcheessinne ba yelido naatussi qarettenna.

English Sentences: The tender and delicate woman among you, which would not adventure to set the sole of her foot upon the ground for delicateness and tenderness, her eye shall be evil toward the husband of her bosom, and toward her son, and toward her daughter,
Wolaitta Sentences: Morkketi katamaa dooddidi un77ettidoogaappe denddidaagan, harabi maanau bainna gishshau, ba miyo ba naatu ashuwaappe harau ooyyoonne immenna.

English Sentences: And toward her young one that cometh out from between her feet, and toward her children which she shall bear: for she shall eat them for want of all things secretly in the siege and straitness, wherewith thine enemy shall distress thee in thy gates.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ne giddon kase injjiyan de7aasu giyo, ba injjiyaappe denddidaagan sa7aa yedhdhanau shaatettiya maccaasiyaakka, ba siiqiyo azinaassi ba attumanne macca naatussi qarettukku.

English Sentences: If thou wilt not observe to do all the words of this law that are written in this book, that thou mayest fear this glorious and fearful name, THE LORD THY GOD;
Wolaitta Sentences: A ba yelido do7aanne ba yelido yiiraa ba siiqiyo azinaakka ba yelido naatakka gattennan, uuzettada geeman barkka marggana. Aissi giikko, morkkee a de7iyo katamaa dooddidi o un77ettidonne tuggayido gishshau, iyyo miyoobi harabi aibinne baawa.

English Sentences: Then the LORD will make thy plagues wonderful, and the plagues of thy seed, even great plagues, and of long continuance, and sore sicknesses, and of long continuance.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Ha maxaafan xaafettida higgiyaa qaalata ubbaa neeni naagana xayikko, GODAA ne Xoossaa maalaalissiyaanne yashshiya sunttaa bonchchennan aggikko,

English Sentences: Moreover he will bring upon thee all the diseases of Egypt, which thou wast afraid of; and they shall cleave unto thee.
Wolaitta Sentences: ne bollinne ne zariyaa ubbaa bolli GODAI yashshiya boshaa, simmenna bashshaanne xalee bainna iita harggiyaa ne bolli yeddana.

English Sentences: Also every sickness, and every plague, which is not written in the book of this law, them will the LORD bring upon thee, until thou be destroyed.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Kase Gibxxe asaa bolli be7ada, neeni yayyido Gibxxe harggiyaa ubbaa zaaridi, ne bolli ehaana; he harggee nena yeddenna.

English Sentences: And ye shall be left few in number, whereas ye were as the stars of heaven for multitude; because thou wouldest not obey the voice of the LORD thy God.
Wolaitta Sentences: Qassi ha higgiyaa maxaafan xaafettibeenna hargge ubbaanne bosha ubbaa ne xayana gakkanaashin, GODAI ne bolli ehaana.

English Sentences: And it shall come to pass, that as the LORD rejoiced over you to do you good, and to multiply you; so the LORD will rejoice over you to destroy you, and to bring you to nought; and ye shall be plucked from off the land whither thou goest to possess it.
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAA intte Xoossaa qaalaa siyennan ixxido gishshau, saluwaa xoolinttiyaadan corattida intteppe guuttai attana.

English Sentences: And the LORD shall scatter thee among all people, from the one end of the earth even unto the other; and there thou shalt serve other gods, which neither thou nor thy fathers have known, even wood and stone.
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAI intteyyo lo77obaa oottiyo wodenne intte qoodaa corayiyo wode dosidoogaadan, ha77i intte bollan bashshaa ehiyo wodekka inttena laaliyo wodekka ufaittana; intte laattanau biyo biittaappekka shodettidi xayana.

English Sentences: And among these nations shalt thou find no ease, neither shall the sole of thy foot have rest: but the LORD shall give thee there a trembling heart, and failing of eyes, and sorrow of mind:
Wolaitta Sentences: "GODAI inttena biittau ha gaxaappe ya gaxaa gakkanaashin, biitta ubban laalana. Hegan inttena gidin, woi intte maizza aawati eribeenna, hara mittanne shuchcha xoossatuyyo goinnana.

English Sentences: And thy life shall hang in doubt before thee; and thou shalt fear day and night, and shalt have none assurance of thy life:
Wolaitta Sentences: He kawotettatu giddon intte woppaa demmekketa; intte tohuwaa caammai yedhdhiyo sohuwaa keena gadeekka intteyyo de7enna. Hegan GODAI intteyyo metobaa qofa xallan kumida huuphiyaa, amo xallan daafurida aifiyaanne hidootaa qanxxuwan kumida wozanaa immana.

English Sentences: In the morning thou shalt say, Would God it were even! and at even thou shalt say, Would God it were morning! for the fear of thine heart wherewith thou shalt fear, and for the sight of thine eyes which thou shalt see.
Wolaitta Sentences: Intte de7oi ubbai hirggaana gidana; gallassinne qammi shabbirssaaninne haiquwaa yashshan un77ettidi daana.

English Sentences: And the LORD shall bring thee into Egypt again with ships, by the way whereof I spake unto thee, Thou shalt see it no more again: and there ye shall be sold unto your enemies for bondmen and bondwomen, and no man shall buy you.
Wolaitta Sentences: Intte wozanan kumida yashshaappenne intte aifee be7iyo palaappe denddidaagan, intte wonttiyo wode, Aude qammanddeeshsha qassi qammiyo wode, Aude wonttanddeeshsha yaagana.

English Sentences: These are the words of the covenant, which the LORD commanded Moses to make with the children of Israel in the land of Moab, beside the covenant which he made with them in Horeb.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani inttena, Naa77antto ha ogiyaa beekketa giido ogiyaara GODAI inttena zaaridi markkabiyan guyye Gibxxe yeddana. Hegan intte aille gidanau, intte morkketuyyo inttena baizzanau koyana; shin inttena ailleyanaukka shammiyaabaa demmekketa" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And Moses called unto all Israel, and said unto them, Ye have seen all that the LORD did before your eyes in the land of Egypt unto Pharaoh, and unto all his servants, and unto all his land;
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAI Siinaa Deriyan Israa7eelatuura maacettido maachchaa qaalaa bolli haraa Moo7aaban etaara maacettanau Muusa azazido maachchaa qaalati hageeta.

English Sentences: The great temptations which thine eyes have seen, the signs, and those great miracles:
Wolaitta Sentences: Muusee Israa7eela asaa ubbaa xeesi shiishshidi, etassi yootidobai hagaa; "GODAI intte sinttan Gibxxe kawuwaa bolli, a olanchchatu ubbaa bollinne a biittaa ubbaa bolli oottidobaanne gattidobaa intte aifiyan be7ideta.

English Sentences: Yet the LORD hath not given you an heart to perceive, and eyes to see, and ears to hear, unto this day.
Wolaitta Sentences: He iita metota, gita maalaalissiyaabatanne oorattabata intte aifiyan be7ideta.

English Sentences: And I have led you forty years in the wilderness: your clothes are not waxen old upon you, and thy shoe is not waxen old upon thy foot.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin hachchi gakkanaashin, GODAI intteyyo akeekiya wozanaa, xeelliya aifiyaanne siyiya haittaa immibeenna.

English Sentences: Ye have not eaten bread, neither have ye drunk wine or strong drink: that ye might know that I am the LORD your God.
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAI oitamu laittaa kumettaa inttena biittaa bazzuwan kaalettiyo wode, intte maayoi intte bollaappe wuribeenna, intte caammaikka intte tohuwaappe wuribeenna.

English Sentences: And when ye came unto this place, Sihon the king of Heshbon, and Og the king of Bashan, came out against us unto battle, and we smote them:
Wolaitta Sentences: Intte miyo oittai, uyiyo woiniyaa eessai, woikko hara mattoyiya ushshai baawa; xayikkonne GODAI intteyyo Xoossaa gidiyoogaa erissidi tamaarissanaayyo, inttessi koshshiyaabaappe ainne pacissibeenna.

English Sentences: And we took their land, and gave it for an inheritance unto the Reubenites, and to the Gadites, and to the half tribe of Manasseh.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Nuuni ha sohuwaa gakkido wode, Haseboona Kawoi Sihooninne Baasaane Kawoi Oogi nunaara olettanau yiidosona; shin nuuni eta xoonida.

English Sentences: Keep therefore the words of this covenant, and do them, that ye may prosper in all that ye do.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eta biittaa ekkidi, Roobeelanne Gaada zaretu qassi Minaase zariyaappe baggaayyo laata oottidi immida.

English Sentences: Ye stand this day all of you before the LORD your God; your captains of your tribes, your elders, and your officers, with all the men of Israel,
Wolaitta Sentences: "Intte oiqqobainne yedhdhobai intteyyo anjjettana mala, ha maachchaa qaalata ammanettidi polite.

English Sentences: Your little ones, your wives, and thy stranger that is in thy camp, from the hewer of thy wood unto the drawer of thy water:
Wolaitta Sentences: Hachchi intte ubbai, zariyaa halaqati, cimati, sunttatinne Israa7eela asai ubbai hagan eqqideta.

English Sentences: That thou shouldest enter into covenant with the LORD thy God, and into his oath, which the LORD thy God maketh with thee this day:
Wolaitta Sentences: Intte naatuura, intte maccaasaara intte giddon de7iya kare biittaa asaaranne intte son mittaa qoriyaanne haattaa tikkiya oosanchchatuura issippe, hagan eqqideta.

English Sentences: That he may establish thee to day for a people unto himself, and that he may be unto thee a God, as he hath said unto thee, and as he hath sworn unto thy fathers, to Abraham, to Isaac, and to Jacob.
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAARA, intte Xoossaara, qaalaa caaquwaa gelanau, GODAARA maachchan maayidobaa polanau giigidi shiiqideta.

English Sentences: Neither with you only do I make this covenant and this oath;
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAI inttena ba asa oottidi minttana; intteyyoonne beni intte maizza aawatuyyo, Abrahaamayyo, Yisaaqayyoonne Yaaqoobayyo gelido maachchaa qaalaadan, i intteyyo Xoossaa gidana.

English Sentences: But with him that standeth here with us this day before the LORD our God, and also with him that is not here with us this day:
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani ha maachchaa caaquwaa wottiyoogee intte xallaara gidenna.

English Sentences: (For ye know how we have dwelt in the land of Egypt; and how we came through the nations which ye passed by;
Wolaitta Sentences: Hachchi hagan nunaara GODAA nu Xoossaa sinttan eqqida nu ubbaaranne sinttanau yaana nu yeleta ubbaara wottais.

English Sentences: And ye have seen their abominations, and their idols, wood and stone, silver and gold, which were among them:)
Wolaitta Sentences: "Nuuni Gibxxen waani de7idaakkonne qassi hagaa gakkanaashin, ogiyan de7iya kawotettatu gidduwaara waani kanttidi yiidaakko ereeta.

English Sentences: Lest there should be among you man, or woman, or family, or tribe, whose heart turneth away this day from the LORD our God, to go and serve the gods of these nations; lest there should be among you a root that beareth gall and wormwood;
Wolaitta Sentences: Eta giddon de7iya tuna eeqaa, massido mittaa, shuchchaa, biraanne worqqaa eeqa misileta be7ideta.

English Sentences: And it come to pass, when he heareth the words of this curse, that he bless himself in his heart, saying, I shall have peace, though I walk in the imagination of mine heart, to add drunkenness to thirst:
Wolaitta Sentences: Ha intteppe ooninne attuma gidin macca gidin, issi keetta asa gidin zare gidin, GODAAPPE, nu Xoossaappe, sher77i giidi, hara kawotettatu xoossatuyyo goinnennaadan naagettite. Hegaa oottiya asi cammiyaanne woriya aifiyaa aifiya mitta gidana.

English Sentences: The LORD will not spare him, but then the anger of the LORD and his jealousy shall smoke against that man, and all the curses that are written in this book shall lie upon him, and the LORD shall blot out his name from under heaven.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Ha caaquwaa qaalaa siyidi, ba wozanan, Ta sheniyan taani biikkokka, aiba metoinne baawa yaagidi bana cimmikko, hegaa mala asi lo77otu bollinne iitatu bolli bashshaa ehaana.

English Sentences: And the LORD shall separate him unto evil out of all the tribes of Israel, according to all the curses of the covenant that are written in this book of the law:
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAA hanqqoinne qanaatee hegaa mala asa bolli eexxi kiyanaappe attin, GODAI a maarenna. Ha maxaafan xaafettida qanggetta ubbai a bolli yaana; saloppe garssa baggaappe a sunttaa GODAI xaissana.

English Sentences: So that the generation to come of your children that shall rise up after you, and the stranger that shall come from a far land, shall say, when they see the plagues of that land, and the sicknesses which the LORD hath laid upon it;
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAI ha Higgiyaa Maxaafan xaafettida qanggettaa maachchaadan he asa Israa7eela asaappe shaakkidi xaissana.

English Sentences: And that the whole land thereof is brimstone, and salt, and burning, that it is not sown, nor beareth, nor any grass groweth therein, like the overthrow of Sodom, and Gomorrah, Admah, and Zeboim, which the LORD overthrew in his anger, and in his wrath:
Wolaitta Sentences: "Sinttappe yiya yeletai, intte zareenne haaho deriyaappe yiya hara biittaa asai GODAI intte bolli ehiido boshaanne metuwaa be7ana.

English Sentences: Even all nations shall say, Wherefore hath the LORD done thus unto this land? what meaneth the heat of this great anger?
Wolaitta Sentences: Biitta ubbai dinniyaaninne maxiniyan kamettidi, aiba go77anne immennaagaa gidana; aibanne zeranaunne mokissanau danddayettenna; in maati mitti diccenna. GODAI ba hanqquwan xaissido Sadoomadaaninne Gamooradan, Adaamadaaninne Xaboima katamatudan hanana.

English Sentences: Then men shall say, Because they have forsaken the covenant of the LORD God of their fathers, which he made with them when he brought them forth out of the land of Egypt:
Wolaitta Sentences: Kawotetta ubbai hagaadan yaagana; GODAI ha biittan hagaa malabaa aibissi oottidee? Ha wolqqaama hanqquwaassi gaaso gididabai aibee? yaagana.

English Sentences: For they went and served other gods, and worshipped them, gods whom they knew not, and whom he had not given unto them:
Wolaitta Sentences: "Asai zaaridi, Eti GODAI, eta aawatu Xoossai, eta Gibxxeppe kessiyo wode, etaara gelido maachchaa qaalaa menttido gishshaassa.

English Sentences: And the anger of the LORD was kindled against this land, to bring upon it all the curses that are written in this book:
Wolaitta Sentences: Qassi eti biidi, erenna xoossatuyyoonne i eta goinnoppite giido xoossatuyyo goinnidosona.

English Sentences: And the LORD rooted them out of their land in anger, and in wrath, and in great indignation, and cast them into another land, as it is this day.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaa gishshau, GODAI hanqqettidi, ha maxaafan xaafettida qanggetta ubbaa eta bolli ehiis.

English Sentences: The secret things belong unto the LORD our God: but those things which are revealed belong unto us and to our children for ever, that we may do all the words of this law.
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAI wolqqaama hanqquwaa hanqqettidi, eta biittaappe eta shoddidi, hagaadan hara biitti yedettiis yaagana.

English Sentences: And it shall come to pass, when all these things are come upon thee, the blessing and the curse, which I have set before thee, and thou shalt call them to mind among all the nations, whither the LORD thy God hath driven thee,
Wolaitta Sentences: "Xuura yohoti GODAA nu Xoossaassa; shin nuuni ha higgiyaa qaalaa oottanaadan, qonccida yohoti merinau nuussanne nu naatussa.

English Sentences: And shalt return unto the LORD thy God, and shalt obey his voice according to all that I command thee this day, thou and thy children, with all thine heart, and with all thy soul;
Wolaitta Sentences: "Ha ta intte sinttan wottido anjjoinne qanggettai intte bollan gakkiyo wode, GODAI intte Xoossai inttena laaliyo hara kawotettatu giddon de7iiddi, hagaa intte hassayana.

English Sentences: That then the LORD thy God will turn thy captivity, and have compassion upon thee, and will return and gather thee from all the nations, whither the LORD thy God hath scattered thee.
Wolaitta Sentences: He wode inttenne intte naati GODAAKKO, intte Xoossaakko, simmidi, intte kumetta wozanaappenne intte kumetta shemppuwaappe taani hachchi inttena azazido qaalau azazettikko,

English Sentences: If any of thine be driven out unto the outmost parts of heaven, from thence will the LORD thy God gather thee, and from thence will he fetch thee:
Wolaitta Sentences: hegan GODAI intte Xoossai intte omooduwaa zaarana; i intteyyo qarettana. GODAI intte Xoossai inttena laalido kawotettatu ubbaa giddoppekka zaaridi shiishshana.

English Sentences: And the LORD thy God will bring thee into the land which thy fathers possessed, and thou shalt possess it; and he will do thee good, and multiply thee above thy fathers.
Wolaitta Sentences: Biittaa gaxaa gakkanaashin laalettikkokka, hegaappe GODAI intte Xoossai inttena zaaridi shiishshana.

English Sentences: And the LORD thy God will circumcise thine heart, and the heart of thy seed, to love the LORD thy God with all thine heart, and with all thy soul, that thou mayest live.
Wolaitta Sentences: Intte aawati kase laattido biittaa inttekka laattanaadan GODAI intte Xoossai inttena he biittau ehaana. Yan inttena intte aawatuppe aattidi dureyananne intte qoodaa darissana.

English Sentences: And the LORD thy God will put all these curses upon thine enemies, and on them that hate thee, which persecuted thee.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Intte de7uwan de7ana malanne GODAA intte Xoossaa intte kumetta wozanaappenne intte kumetta shemppuwaappe siiqanaadan, i intteyyoonne intte naatuyyo azazettiya wozanaa immana.

English Sentences: And thou shalt return and obey the voice of the LORD, and do all his commandments which I command thee this day.
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAI intte Xoossai ha qanggetta ubbaa intte morkketunne inttena yedettiyaageetu bolli ehaana.

English Sentences: And the LORD thy God will make thee plenteous in every work of thine hand, in the fruit of thy body, and in the fruit of thy cattle, and in the fruit of thy land, for good: for the LORD will again rejoice over thee for good, as he rejoiced over thy fathers:
Wolaitta Sentences: Inttekka zaaridi GODAAYYO, intte Xoossaayyo, azazettana; taani hachchi inttena azaziyo a azazuwaakka naagana.

English Sentences: If thou shalt hearken unto the voice of the LORD thy God, to keep his commandments and his statutes which are written in this book of the law, and if thou turn unto the LORD thy God with all thine heart, and with all thy soul.
Wolaitta Sentences: Intte ha Higgiyaa Maxaafan xaafettida GODAA intte Xoossaa azazotanne a wogata naaganau GODAAYYO, intte Xoossaayyo, azazettikko, qassi intte intte kumetta wozanaappenne intte kumetta shemppuwaappe GODAAKKO, intte Xoossaakko,

English Sentences: For this commandment which I command thee this day, it is not hidden from thee, neither is it far off.
Wolaitta Sentences: simmikko, i inttena intte kushiyaa ooso ubban, intte uluwaa aifiyan, intte mehiyaa aifiyaaninne intte biittaa aifiyan darissidi anjjana. Aissi giikko, kase intte aawata anjjiyoogan ufaittidoogaadan, GODAI ha77i inttena anjjiyoogankka ufaittana.

English Sentences: It is not in heaven, that thou shouldest say, Who shall go up for us to heaven, and bring it unto us, that we may hear it, and do it?
Wolaitta Sentences: "Taani hachchi inttena azaziyo ha azazoi hegaa keena deexo gidenna; intteppe haahokka gidenna.

English Sentences: Neither is it beyond the sea, that thou shouldest say, Who shall go over the sea for us, and bring it unto us, that we may hear it, and do it?
Wolaitta Sentences: Intte, Nuuni siyidi azazettanaadan, saluwaa kiyidi nuuyyo wottanai oonee? geennaadan saluwan de7enna.

English Sentences: But the word is very nigh unto thee, in thy mouth, and in thy heart, that thou mayest do it.
Wolaitta Sentences: Nuuni siyidi azazettanaadan, nuuyyo abbaa pinnidi ehaanai oonee? geennaadan abbaa hefinttan de7enna.

English Sentences: See, I have set before thee this day life and good, and death and evil;
Wolaitta Sentences: Qaalai intteyyo keehi matan de7ees; intte oottanaadan, qaalai intte wozanaaninne intte doonan de7ees.

English Sentences: In that I command thee this day to love the LORD thy God, to walk in his ways, and to keep his commandments and his statutes and his judgments, that thou mayest live and multiply: and the LORD thy God shall bless thee in the land whither thou goest to possess it.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Be7ite, taani hachchi intte sinttan de7uwaanne lo77otettaa, haiquwaanne bashshaa wottaas.

English Sentences: But if thine heart turn away, so that thou wilt not hear, but shalt be drawn away, and worship other gods, and serve them;
Wolaitta Sentences: Intte GODAA intte Xoossaa siiqiyoogan a ogiyan hemettiyoogaaninne a azazuwaa, a awaajuwaanne a wogaa naagiyoogan, taani hachchi inttena azaziyo GODAU, intte Xoossau, azazettikko, intte de7uwan de7ananne corattana; qassi intte laattanau geliyo biittan GODAI intte Xoossai inttena anjjana.

English Sentences: I denounce unto you this day, that ye shall surely perish, and that ye shall not prolong your days upon the land, whither thou passest over Jordan to go to possess it.
Wolaitta Sentences: "SHin intte wozanai wora simmin, intte azazettennan ixxikko, hara xoossatussi goinnikko, qassi etau oottikko,

English Sentences: I call heaven and earth to record this day against you, that I have set before you life and death, blessing and cursing: therefore choose life, that both thou and thy seed may live:
Wolaitta Sentences: intte wuri xayanaagaa taani hachchi intteyyo yootais. Yorddaanoosa pinnidi, intte laattanau biyo biittan intte laittai aduqqenna.

English Sentences: That thou mayest love the LORD thy God, and that thou mayest obey his voice, and that thou mayest cleave unto him: for he is thy life, and the length of thy days: that thou mayest dwell in the land which the LORD sware unto thy fathers, to Abraham, to Isaac, and to Jacob, to give them.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Taani intte sinttan de7uwaanne haiquwaa, anjjuwaanne qanggettaa wottidoogau hachchi saluwaanne sa7aa intte bolli markkayana; simmi inttenne intte zaree de7uwan de7ana mala, de7uwaa doorite.

English Sentences: And Moses went and spake these words unto all Israel.
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAA intte Xoossaa siiqite; a qaalaa siyite, ayyo azazettite; aara ohettite. Hegaadan hanikko, GODAI kase intte maizza aawatuyyo, Abrahaamayyo, Yisaaqayyoonne Yaaqoobayyo immanau caaqqido biittan inttenne intte naati adussa laittaa de7ana" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And he said unto them, I am an hundred and twenty years old this day; I can no more go out and come in: also the LORD hath said unto me, Thou shalt not go over this Jordan.
Wolaitta Sentences: Muusee gujjidikka Israa7eela asau hagaadan yaagiis;

English Sentences: The LORD thy God, he will go over before thee, and he will destroy these nations from before thee, and thou shalt possess them: and Joshua, he shall go over before thee, as the LORD hath said.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Ha77i taayyo xeetanne laatamu laitta gidido gishshau, hagaappe sinttanau inttena kaalettanau danddayikke; hegaa bollikka GODAI tana, Neeni Yorddaanoosa hefintti pinnakka yaagidi yootiis.

English Sentences: And the LORD shall do unto them as he did to Sihon and to Og, kings of the Amorites, and unto the land of them, whom he destroyed.
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAI intte Xoossai intte sinttan hemettidi inttena kaalettana. Hegan de7iya kawotettata i wurssiyo gishshau, eta biittaa intte laattana. Qassi GODAI giidoogaadan Yaasu inttena kaalettana.

English Sentences: And the LORD shall give them up before your face, that ye may do unto them according unto all the commandments which I have commanded you.
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAI Amoore Kawota Sihoonanne Ooga xoonidi, eta biittaa xaissidoogaadan, intte morkketakka hegaadan oottana.

English Sentences: Be strong and of a good courage, fear not, nor be afraid of them: for the LORD thy God, he it is that doth go with thee; he will not fail thee, nor forsake thee.
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAI eta intteyyo aatti immana; immin intte eta bolli taani inttena azazidoogaadan oottana.

English Sentences: And Moses called unto Joshua, and said unto him in the sight of all Israel, Be strong and of a good courage: for thou must go with this people unto the land which the LORD hath sworn unto their fathers to give them; and thou shalt cause them to inherit it.
Wolaitta Sentences: Minnite; aikko baawa; yayyoppite. Eta be7idi dagammoppite. Aissi giikko, GODAI intte Xoossai inttenaara gidana. I inttena yeggenna woikko aggenna" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And the LORD, he it is that doth go before thee; he will be with thee, he will not fail thee, neither forsake thee: fear not, neither be dismayed.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaappe guyyiyan, Muusee Yaasa xeesidi, Israa7eela asaa ubbaa sinttan hegaadan yaagiis, "Minna; minna; aikko baawa. Aissi giikko, neeni ha asaara issippe GODAI eta maizza aawatuyyo immana giidi caaqqido biittaa gelaasa; he biittaakka eta laatissaasa.

English Sentences: And Moses wrote this law, and delivered it unto the priests the sons of Levi, which bare the ark of the covenant of the LORD, and unto all the elders of Israel.
Wolaitta Sentences: I GODAI ba huuphen nenaara gididi nena kaalettana. I nena olenna; ainnekka nena aggenna. Hegaa gishshau, yayyoppa; ne wozanan dagammoppa" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And Moses commanded them, saying, At the end of every seven years, in the solemnity of the year of release, in the feast of tabernacles,
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaagidi Muusee ha higgiyaa xaafidi, GODAA Maachchaa Taabootaa tookkiya qeese gidiya Leewa naatussinne Israa7eela cimatu ubbaassi immiis.

English Sentences: When all Israel is come to appear before the LORD thy God in the place which he shall choose, thou shalt read this law before all Israel in their hearing.
Wolaitta Sentences: Immidi Muusee eta hagaadan yaagidi azaziis; "Aco ubbai atto geetettiyo laappuntta laittaa wurssettan, bonchchettiya Daase Baalaa gallassan, ha higgiyaa xoqqu oottidi nabbabite.

English Sentences: Gather the people together, men, and women, and children, and thy stranger that is within thy gates, that they may hear, and that they may learn, and fear the LORD your God, and observe to do all the words of this law:
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAA intte Xoossaa sintti i doorido sohuwaa ayyo goinnanau Israa7eela asai ubbai shiiqiyo wode, eti siyiyaadan nabbabite.

English Sentences: And that their children, which have not known any thing, may hear, and learn to fear the LORD your God, as long as ye live in the land whither ye go over Jordan to possess it.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti ubbaikka siyidi, GODAASSI, intte Xoossaassi, yayyiyoogaa tamaarana mala, ha higgiyaa qaala ubbaa ammanettidi polana mala, asaa, attumanne macca, naatanne intte biittan de7iya kare biitta asaa issippe shiishshite.

English Sentences: And the LORD said unto Moses, Behold, thy days approach that thou must die: call Joshua, and present yourselves in the tabernacle of the congregation, that I may give him a charge. And Moses and Joshua went, and presented themselves in the tabernacle of the congregation.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ha higgiyaa qaalaa erenna eta naatikka Yorddaanoosa pinnidi, intte laattanau biyo biittan intte de7iyo laitta ubban ha higgiyaa siyona; GODAAYYO, intte Xoossaayyo, yayyiyoogaa tamaarona" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And the LORD appeared in the tabernacle in a pillar of a cloud: and the pillar of the cloud stood over the door of the tabernacle.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaappe guyyiyan, GODAI Muusa hagaadan yaagiis; "Be7a, neeni haiqqiyo gallassai matiis. I kaaletettiyo azazuwaa ayyo taani immana mala, Yaasa xeegada, neeni aara issippe Dunkkaaniyaa giddo gelite" yaagin, Muuseenne Yaasu Dunkkaaniyaakko shiiqidosona.

English Sentences: And the LORD said unto Moses, Behold, thou shalt sleep with thy fathers; and this people will rise up, and go a whoring after the gods of the strangers of the land, whither they go to be among them, and will forsake me, and break my covenant which I have made with them.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHiiqin GODAI he Dunkkaaniyan shaaraa tuussan etau qoncciis; he shaaraa tuussaikka Dunkkaaniyaa penggen eqqiis.

English Sentences: Then my anger shall be kindled against them in that day, and I will forsake them, and I will hide my face from them, and they shall be devoured, and many evils and troubles shall befall them; so that they will say in that day, Are not these evils come upon us, because our God is not among us?
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAI Muusa hagaadan yaagiis; "Neeni matan haiqqada ne aawatun gaittaasa. Neeppe guyyiyan, ha asai tau ammanettennaagaa gidana; taani etaara wottido maachchaa kanttana. Eti tana aggidi, shaaramuxatudan, bantta laattiyo biittan de7iya eeqata kaallana.

English Sentences: And I will surely hide my face in that day for all the evils which they shall have wrought, in that they are turned unto other gods.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegee haniyo wode, ta hanqqoi eta bolli eexxi kiyana. Taanikka eta aggaagana; ta som77uwaa etappe wora zaarana. Yaatin, eti xayana; iita metoinne bashshai eta bolli yaana. He wodiyan eti, Tumu ha metoi gakkidoi nu Xoossai nu giddon bainnaagaa gishshaassa gidennee? yaagidi oichchana.

English Sentences: Now therefore write ye this song for you, and teach it the children of Israel: put it in their mouths, that this song may be a witness for me against the children of Israel.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hara xoossatussi goinnidi, eti hanido iitabaa gishshau, taani he gallassi ta som77uwaa mulekka etappe wora zaarana.

English Sentences: For when I shall have brought them into the land which I sware unto their fathers, that floweth with milk and honey; and they shall have eaten and filled themselves, and waxen fat; then will they turn unto other gods, and serve them, and provoke me, and break my covenant.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Hegaa gishshau, ha77i ha mazamuriyaa xaafada, Israa7eela asaa ubbaa tamaarissa. Ha mazamuree taayyo Israa7eela asaa bolla markka gidana mala, eta yexissa.

English Sentences: And it shall come to pass, when many evils and troubles are befallen them, that this song shall testify against them as a witness; for it shall not be forgotten out of the mouths of their seed: for I know their imagination which they go about, even now, before I have brought them into the land which I sware.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eta maizza aawatuyyo gelido qaalaadan, maattainne eessai goggiyo biittaa taani eta gelissidoogaappe guyyiyaaninne eti mi kallidi, wozanaa muumidoogaappe guyyiyan, hara xoossatuyyo goinnidi, tana karana; ta maachchaakka kanttana.

English Sentences: Moses therefore wrote this song the same day, and taught it the children of Israel.
Wolaitta Sentences: Daro metoinne bashshai eta bolli gakkido wode, ha mazamuree eta naatu doonaappe digettenna gishshau, eta bolli markka gidana. Aissi giikko, taani caaqqido biittaa eta biron gelissennan de7ishin, haarakka eti qoppiyo qofaa eraichchaas" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And he gave Joshua the son of Nun a charge, and said, Be strong and of a good courage: for thou shalt bring the children of Israel into the land which I sware unto them: and I will be with thee.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaagin Muusee he gallassi he mazamuriyaa xaafidi, Israa7eela asaa tamaarissiis.

English Sentences: And it came to pass, when Moses had made an end of writing the words of this law in a book, until they were finished,
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaappe guyyiyan, GODAI Nawe na7aa Yaasa hagaadan yaagidi azaziis; "Minna, aikko baawa; taani etau immanau qaalaa gelido biittaa Israa7eela asaa efaada gelissaasa. Taanikka nenaara issippe gidana" yaagiis.

English Sentences: That Moses commanded the Levites, which bare the ark of the covenant of the LORD, saying,
Wolaitta Sentences: Muusee ha higgiyaa qaalata koiroppe wurssettaa gakkanaashin, xaafidi wurssidoogaappe guyyiyan,

English Sentences: Take this book of the law, and put it in the side of the ark of the covenant of the LORD your God, that it may be there for a witness against thee.
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAA Maachchaa Taabootaa tookkiya Leewata hagaadan yaagidi azaziis;

English Sentences: For I know thy rebellion, and thy stiff neck: behold, while I am yet alive with you this day, ye have been rebellious against the LORD; and how much more after my death?
Wolaitta Sentences: "GODAA higgee xaafettido ha maxaafaa efiite; efiidi GODAA intte Xoossaa Maachchaa Taabootaa matan wottite. Hegan i intte bolli markka gidana mala yan wottite.

English Sentences: Gather unto me all the elders of your tribes, and your officers, that I may speak these words in their ears, and call heaven and earth to record against them.
Wolaitta Sentences: Intte woisa makkalanchchakkonne woisa morgge zozzakko taani erais. Be7ite, ta inttenaara de7ido laitta ubban intte GODAU iita makkala; shin taani haiqqaichchin, ubba woisaa makkalanddetii?

English Sentences: For I know that after my death ye will utterly corrupt yourselves, and turn aside from the way which I have commanded you; and evil will befall you in the latter days; because ye will do evil in the sight of the LORD, to provoke him to anger through the work of your hands.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaa gishshau, hagaa ubbaa ta etau yootanau, saluwaanne sa7aa ta eta bolli markkayanau, intte zariyaa halaqata ubbaanne deriyaa kaalettiya asa ubbaa tau shiishshite.

English Sentences: And Moses spake in the ears of all the congregation of Israel the words of this song, until they were ended.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ta haiqqidoogaappe guyyiyan, intte mule iita asa gidanaagaanne taani inttena tamaarissido azazuwaappe wora simmanaagaa taani erais. I oottoppite giido iitabaa intte kushiyan oottidi, GODAA hanqqetissiyo gishshau, sinttappe yiya wodiyan intte bolli iita boshaa ehaana" yaagiis.

English Sentences: Give ear, O ye heavens, and I will speak; and hear, O earth, the words of my mouth.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaappe guyyiyan, Muusee ha mazamuriyaa qaalati wurana gakkanaashin, shiiqida Israa7eela yaa7aa ubbaa sissidi yootiis.

English Sentences: My doctrine shall drop as the rain, my speech shall distil as the dew, as the small rain upon the tender herb, and as the showers upon the grass:
Wolaitta Sentences: "Inttenoo, salotoo, taani yootiyoogaa ezggite; biittaikka ta doonaa qaalaa siyo.

English Sentences: Because I will publish the name of the LORD: ascribe ye greatness unto our God.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ta timirttee iraadan bukko; ta qaalaikka akkaadan, purcco maataa bollan wodhdhiya nazziina iraadaaninne carshshaa bollan wodhdhiya diifiyaadan wodhdho.

English Sentences: He is the Rock, his work is perfect: for all his ways are judgment: a God of truth and without iniquity, just and right is he.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Taani GODAA sunttaa awaajjana; gitatettaa nu Xoossau immite.

English Sentences: They have corrupted themselves, their spot is not the spot of his children: they are a perverse and crooked generation.
Wolaitta Sentences: I nu zaallaattenne, a oosuwan wotoi baa; a oge ubbaikka suure. Nu Xoossai ammanettiyaagaanne iitatettai bainnaagaa; i tumanchchanne suure.

English Sentences: Do ye thus requite the LORD, O foolish people and unwise? is not he thy father that hath bought thee? hath he not made thee, and established thee?
Wolaitta Sentences: "Intte ammanettennanne aibaunne pattenna, nagaranchchanne balettiya yeleta gidiyo gishshau, a asa gidanau intte bessekketa.

English Sentences: Remember the days of old, consider the years of many generations: ask thy father, and he will shew thee; thy elders, and they will tell thee.
Wolaitta Sentences: Inttenoo eeyyanne akeeki bainna asau, intte GODAAYYO immiyo zaaroi hagee? I inttena medhdhida intte Aawaa gidennee? I inttena medhdhidi, mintti essiis.

English Sentences: When the Most High divided to the nations their inheritance, when he separated the sons of Adam, he set the bounds of the people according to the number of the children of Israel.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Kase wodiyaa qoppite; daro yeletatu laittaakka akeekite. Intte aawata oichchite; eti inttena bessana. Intte cimatakka oichchite; eti intteyyo yootana.

English Sentences: For the LORD's portion is his people; Jacob is the lot of his inheritance.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ubbaappe Wolqqaamai kawotettatuyyo eti de7iyoosaa laatissido wode, asaa naata eta zariyan zariyan shaakkido wode, Israa7eela asaa qoodaadan, eta zawaa essiis.

English Sentences: He found him in a desert land, and in the waste howling wilderness; he led him about, he instructed him, he kept him as the apple of his eye.
Wolaitta Sentences: Aissi giikko, shaahuwan GODAA gakkidaagee Israa7eela; Yaaqoobikka a gakkida laataa.

English Sentences: As an eagle stirreth up her nest, fluttereth over her young, spreadeth abroad her wings, taketh them, beareth them on her wings:
Wolaitta Sentences: "Biittaa bazzuwan eti saamuwan de7ishin, carkko xallai suraggiyoosan bichchaarishin, eta demmiis. Yaatidi ba aifiyaa buluwaadan, etau gonddalle gididi, eta minttidi naagiis.

English Sentences: So the LORD alone did lead him, and there was no strange god with him.
Wolaitta Sentences: Argganttai ba maraa paaluwaa tamaarissiyoogaadan, ba miccido qefiyan gakki oiqqidi ashshiyoogaadan, hegaadan GODAI ba qefiyan haphphidi eta ashshiis.

English Sentences: He made him ride on the high places of the earth, that he might eat the increase of the fields; and he made him to suck honey out of the rock, and oil out of the flinty rock;
Wolaitta Sentences: Hara allaga xoossi bainnan, GODAA xalaalai ba asaa kaalettiis.

English Sentences: Butter of kine, and milk of sheep, with fat of lambs, and rams of the breed of Bashan, and goats, with the fat of kidneys of wheat; and thou didst drink the pure blood of the grape.
Wolaitta Sentences: "I biittaayyo xoqqa sohuwaa eta kessiis. SHooqan mokkida aifiyaa eta miziis. Zaallaa kooppuwaappe eta eessaa miziis; shuchcha biittaappe zaitiyaa miziis.

English Sentences: But Jeshurun waxed fat, and kicked: thou art waxen fat, thou art grown thick, thou art covered with fatness; then he forsook God which made him, and lightly esteemed the Rock of his salvation.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti mehiyaa wudiyaappe me77ida yeesuwaanne deeshshaa wudiyaappekka maattaa, dorssaa anqqaraanne galssaa miidosona; qassi Baasaane dorssaa wudiyaanne deeshshaa, lo77o gisttiyaara miidosona; suuttaa milatiya woiniyaa eessaakka uyidosona.

English Sentences: They provoked him to jealousy with strange gods, with abominations provoked they him to anger.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Yaanidi Israa7eeli orddiis; makkaliis; mii miidi, boborcciis. Bana medhdhida Xoossaa aggiis; ba Atotettaa Zaallaa bollankka qilliicciis.

English Sentences: They sacrificed unto devils, not to God; to gods whom they knew not, to new gods that came newly up, whom your fathers feared not.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti allaga xoossatuyyo goinniyoogan a mishissidosona; bantta tuna eeqatun a hanqqetissidosona.

English Sentences: Of the Rock that begat thee thou art unmindful, and hast forgotten God that formed thee.
Wolaitta Sentences: Xoossa gidenna xalahetuyyo, kase eti eribeenna xoossatuyyo, zino kiyidaageetuyyo, eta aawati yayyibeenna xoossatuyyo yarshshidosona.

English Sentences: And when the LORD saw it, he abhorred them, because of the provoking of his sons, and of his daughters.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti de7uwaa immida Zaallaa qoppibookkona; qassi yeli dichchida Xoossaa dogidosona.

English Sentences: And he said, I will hide my face from them, I will see what their end shall be: for they are a very froward generation, children in whom is no faith.
Wolaitta Sentences: "GODAI hegaa be7idi, eta bolli hanqqettiis. A attumanne macca naata a sinttappe diggiis.

English Sentences: They have moved me to jealousy with that which is not God; they have provoked me to anger with their vanities: and I will move them to jealousy with those which are not a people; I will provoke them to anger with a foolish nation.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaatidi hagaadan yaagiis; Taani ta som77uwaa etappe genttana; eti geellanne ammanettenna dere gidiyo gishshau, eta omarssaa co77u gaada xeellana.

English Sentences: For a fire is kindled in mine anger, and shall burn unto the lowest hell, and shall consume the earth with her increase, and set on fire the foundations of the mountains.
Wolaitta Sentences: Xoossa gidennaban tana mishissidosona; bantta eeqatun tana hanqqetissidosona. Taanikka eta zare gidennaageetun mishissana; eeyya asa zaretun taani eta hanqqetissana.

English Sentences: I will heap mischiefs upon them; I will spend mine arrows upon them.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ta hanqqoi tamaadan eexxidi, biittan de7iyaaba ubbaa xuuggana. He tamai Si7ooliyan de7iyaagaarakka gattidi xuuggana; deriyaa baasuwaa gakkanaashin, he tamai maana.

English Sentences: They shall be burnt with hunger, and devoured with burning heat, and with bitter destruction: I will also send the teeth of beasts upon them, with the poison of serpents of the dust.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Taani etau metuwaa metuwaa bolli doorana; ta wonddafiyan eta dukkana.

English Sentences: The sword without, and terror within, shall destroy both the young man and the virgin, the suckling also with the man of gray hairs.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti namisan, xuuggiya mishuwaaninne iita harggiyan wurana. Eta bolli meto gattiya bazzo do7atanne eta dukkiya allaga shooshshata eta bolli yeddana.

English Sentences: I said, I would scatter them into corners, I would make the remembrance of them to cease from among men:
Wolaitta Sentences: Toorai oge ubban eta naata wurssana. Keetta ubban shabbirssainne dagamai kawotana. Yelaga attumaageetinne maccaageeti wurana; guutta naatikka cimatikka palahokkona.

English Sentences: Were it not that I feared the wrath of the enemy, lest their adversaries should behave themselves strangely, and lest they should say, Our hand is high, and the LORD hath not done all this.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eta taani haaho sohuwau laalana; hegaappe guyyiyan, eta hassayiyaabi xayana.

English Sentences: For they are a nation void of counsel, neither is there any understanding in them.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin eta morkketi, "Nu wolqqai eta xooniis; hagaa ubbaa GODAI oottibeenna" yaagidi otoruwan ceeqettennan aggokkona yaagada qoppaas yaagiis.

English Sentences: O that they were wise, that they understood this, that they would consider their latter end!
Wolaitta Sentences: "Israa7eela asai zoreti bainna dere; akeeki etau baawa.

English Sentences: How should one chase a thousand, and two put ten thousand to flight, except their Rock had sold them, and the LORD had shut them up?
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti xoonettidoi aibiinakko be7anau etau ixettiis; bantta wurssettaikka aibakkokka erokkona.

English Sentences: For their rock is not as our Rock, even our enemies themselves being judges.
Wolaitta Sentences: Issi sha7u asai issi asan, tammu sha7u asai naa77u asan, waani xoonettidee? GODAI eta Xoossai eta baizzido gishshaassanne eta medhdhida Wolqqaamai eta aatti immido gishshaassa gidennee!

English Sentences: For their vine is of the vine of Sodom, and of the fields of Gomorrah: their grapes are grapes of gall, their clusters are bitter:
Wolaitta Sentences: Eta morkketi bantta xoossai laafa gidiyoogaanne Israa7eela Xoossaa mala gidennaagaa eroosona.

English Sentences: Their wine is the poison of dragons, and the cruel venom of asps.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eta woinee Sadooma woiniyaappenne, Gamoora shooqaappe yiidaagaa. Eta teerai marzze; eta wurccoikka cammiyaagaa.

English Sentences: Is not this laid up in store with me, and sealed up among my treasures?
Wolaitta Sentences: Eta woiniyaa eessai shooshshaa marzze; woriya marzzee de7iyo haso.

English Sentences: To me belongeth vengeance, and recompence; their foot shall slide in due time: for the day of their calamity is at hand, and the things that shall come upon them make haste.
Wolaitta Sentences: "GODAI, Hagaa taani dogidanaa? Ta mazggafan attamabeikkinaa?

English Sentences: For the LORD shall judge his people, and repent himself for his servants, when he seeth that their power is gone, and there is none shut up, or left.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eta bashshaa gallassai matattiis; eta bolli gakkanabai eesotees. He wode eta gedee xubettana. Taani etau haluwaa kessananne kushiyaa zaarana yaagiis.

English Sentences: And he shall say, Where are their gods, their rock in whom they trusted,
Wolaitta Sentences: "Eta wolqqai daafuridoogaanne etakka maaddiyaabi bainnaagaa be7ido wode, GODAI ba asau pirddana; ba ashkkaratussikka qarettana.

English Sentences: Which did eat the fat of their sacrifices, and drank the wine of their drink offerings? let them rise up and help you, and be your protection.
Wolaitta Sentences: I eta hagaadan yaagana; Eti ammanettiyo eta xoossati awaanee? Eti baqatidi a giddon qosettiyo eta zaallai awaanee?

English Sentences: See now that I, even I, am he, and there is no god with me: I kill, and I make alive; I wound, and I heal: neither is there any that can deliver out of my hand.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eta yarshshuwaa modhdhuwaa miidaageeti, eta ushshaa yarshshuwaa woiniyaa eessaa uyidaageeti ha77i denddidi, ane eta maaddona; ane eta ashshona.

English Sentences: For I lift up my hand to heaven, and say, I live for ever.
Wolaitta Sentences: "GODAI tanattenne. Ta xallai Xoossaa. Taappe attin, hara xoossi baawa. Woriyaagee, de7uwaakka immiyaagee tana; taani masunxxissada, taani pattana; ta kushiyaappe ooninne ashshenna.

English Sentences: If I whet my glittering sword, and mine hand take hold on judgment; I will render vengeance to mine enemies, and will reward them that hate me.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ta kushiyaa pude denttada hagaadan yaagana; "Taani merinaukka de7o.

English Sentences: I will make mine arrows drunk with blood, and my sword shall devour flesh; and that with the blood of the slain and of the captives, from the beginning of revenges upon the enemy.
Wolaitta Sentences: PHopholqqu giya ta bisuwaa leefada, pirddanau ta kushiyan oiqqiyo wode, ta morkketu bolli ta haluwaa kiyana; tana ixxiyaageetau eta kushiyaa zaarana.

English Sentences: Rejoice, O ye nations, with his people: for he will avenge the blood of his servants, and will render vengeance to his adversaries, and will be merciful unto his land, and to his people.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ta wonddafeti eta suuttan mattottana; ta bisoikka eta ashuwaa maana. Tana ixxiya ubbaakka maarikke. Harai atto masunxxidaageetikka omoodettidaageetikka haiqqana" yaagana yaagiis.

English Sentences: And Moses came and spake all the words of this song in the ears of the people, he, and Hoshea the son of Nun.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Inttenoo kawotettatoo, GODAA asaara ufaittite. I ba ashkkaratu suuttaa achchana; ba morkketa bollankka haluwaa kiyana. Biittan de7iya ba asaa nagaraakka atto gaana" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And Moses made an end of speaking all these words to all Israel:
Wolaitta Sentences: Muuseenne Nawe na7ai Yaasu Israa7eela asaa sissiiddi, ha mazamuriyaa qaala ubbaa haasayidosona.

English Sentences: And he said unto them, Set your hearts unto all the words which I testify among you this day, which ye shall command your children to observe to do, all the words of this law.
Wolaitta Sentences: Muusee ha qaala ubbaa Israa7eela asa ubbau yooti wurssido wode,

English Sentences: For it is not a vain thing for you; because it is your life: and through this thing ye shall prolong your days in the land, whither ye go over Jordan to possess it.
Wolaitta Sentences: eta hagaadan yaagiis; "Ha higgiyaa qaala ubbaa eti naaganaadaaninne oottanaadan intte naata azazana mala, hachchi ta intteyyo markkattiyo qaala ubbaa intte wozanan wottite.

English Sentences: And the LORD spake unto Moses that selfsame day, saying,
Wolaitta Sentences: Ha qaalai intteyyo de7oppe attin, coo mela qaala gidenna. Ha qaalaa naagikko, intte Yorddaanoosa pinnidi laattana biittankka adussa laittaa de7ana" yaagiis.

English Sentences: Get thee up into this mountain Abarim, unto mount Nebo, which is in the land of Moab, that is over against Jericho; and behold the land of Canaan, which I give unto the children of Israel for a possession:
Wolaitta Sentences: He gallassankka GODAI Muusa hagaadan yaagiis;

English Sentences: And die in the mount whither thou goest up, and be gathered unto thy people; as Aaron thy brother died in mount Hor, and was gathered unto his people:
Wolaitta Sentences: "Moo7aaban Yarkko katamaappe sintta baggaara de7iya Abaarima Deretuppe issuwaa, hini Nabo Deriyaa kiya; hegan Israa7eela asaa ta laatissana Kanaane biittaa hefintti xeella.

English Sentences: Because ye trespassed against me among the children of Israel at the waters of MeribahKadesh, in the wilderness of Zin; because ye sanctified me not in the midst of the children of Israel.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ne ishaa Aarooni Hoora Deriyan haiqqidi, ba maizza aawatun gaittidoogaadan, neenikka ha kiyido deriyan haiqqada, ne maizza aawatun gaittana.

English Sentences: Yet thou shalt see the land before thee; but thou shalt not go thither unto the land which I give the children of Israel.
Wolaitta Sentences: Aissi giikko, intte naa77aikka Israa7eela asaa sinttan taayyo ammanettibeekketa; Xiina bazzuwan, Qaadeesa katamaa matan de7iya Mariiba haattaa matan, ta geeshshatettaa Israa7eela asaa bessibeekketa.

English Sentences: And this is the blessing, wherewith Moses the man of God blessed the children of Israel before his death.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaa gishshau, biittaa haahuwan hefintti xeellanaappe attin, taani Israa7eela asaa laatissana biittaa gelakka" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And he said, The LORD came from Sinai, and rose up from Seir unto them; he shined forth from mount Paran, and he came with ten thousands of saints: from his right hand went a fiery law for them.
Wolaitta Sentences: Xoossa asa gidiya Muusee haiqqanaappe kasetidi, Israa7eela asaa anjjido anjjuwaa qaalai hagaa.

English Sentences: Yea, he loved the people; all his saints are in thy hand: and they sat down at thy feet; every one shall receive of thy words.
Wolaitta Sentences: I hagaadan yaagiis; "GODAI Siinaa Deriyaappe yiis; Eedoomappe nu bollan haa poo7iis; Paaraana Deriyaappe ba asau poo7iis. SHa7an qoodettiya kiitanchchati aara de7oosona. A ushachcha baggaara tamaa lacoi de7ees.

English Sentences: Moses commanded us a law, even the inheritance of the congregation of Jacob.
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAU neeni ne asaa siiqadasa. Geeshshati ubbai ne kushiyan de7oosona; ne gediyaa xaphon gulbbatidi goinnoosona; yaanidi neeppe azazuwaa ekkoosona.

English Sentences: And he was king in Jeshurun, when the heads of the people and the tribes of Israel were gathered together.
Wolaitta Sentences: Muusee immido higgee Yaaqooba asaayyo laata.

English Sentences: Let Reuben live, and not die; and let not his men be few.
Wolaitta Sentences: Israa7eela zareti ubbainne Israa7eela zariyaa halaqati shiiqido wode, GODAI ba asaa, Israa7eela bolli kawotiis.

English Sentences: And this is the blessing of Judah: and he said, Hear, LORD, the voice of Judah, and bring him unto his people: let his hands be sufficient for him; and be thou an help to him from his enemies.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Roobeeli haiqqoppo; i paxa de7o. A asaikka qoodan coratto" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And of Levi he said, Let thy Thummim and thy Urim be with thy holy one, whom thou didst prove at Massah, and with whom thou didst strive at the waters of Meribah;
Wolaitta Sentences: Muusee Yihudaa zariyaabaa hagaadan yaagiis; "Abeet GODAU, Yihudaa waasuwaa siya; hara ba dabbotuura eti gaittanaadan ootta. Eta kushiyaa minttetta; eti bantta morkkiyaara olettiyo wode, neeni eta maadda!" yaagiis.

English Sentences: Who said unto his father and to his mother, I have not seen him; neither did he acknowledge his brethren, nor knew his own children: for they have observed thy word, and kept thy covenant.
Wolaitta Sentences: Muusee Leewa zariyaabaa hagaadan yaagiis; "Ne Tumiimeenne Uriimee ne dosido asassa. Neeni Masaahan paaccido, Mariiba haattan palamettido asassa.

English Sentences: They shall teach Jacob thy judgments, and Israel thy law: they shall put incense before thee, and whole burnt sacrifice upon thine altar.
Wolaitta Sentences: Banttana yelidaageetuppe, ba ishanttuppenne bantta naatuppe aattidi, eti neeyyo ammanettidoogee aadhdhees; ne maachchaa qaalaayyo eti ammanettidosona.

English Sentences: Bless, LORD, his substance, and accept the work of his hands: smite through the loins of them that rise against him, and of them that hate him, that they rise not again.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti ne wogaa Yaaqooba, ne higgiyaakka Israa7eela tamaarissoosona. Ne sinttan ixaanaa cuwayoosona; neeyyo yarshshiyoosan muleera xuuggiyo yarshshuwaa yarshshoosona.

English Sentences: And of Benjamin he said, The beloved of the LORD shall dwell in safety by him; and the Lord shall cover him all the day long, and he shall dwell between his shoulders.
Wolaitta Sentences: Abeet GODAU eta kushee oottidobaa anjja; eti oottiyo ubbaban ne ufaittiyoogaa etau qonccissa. Eta bolli denddiyaabaa mentteretta ola; eta morkketa naa77antta denttoppa" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And of Joseph he said, Blessed of the LORD be his land, for the precious things of heaven, for the dew, and for the deep that coucheth beneath,
Wolaitta Sentences: Biniyaama zariyaabaa hagaadan yaagiis; "GODAI siiqido asai an ammanettidi de7ees. Gallassa kumettan eta i naagees; ba hashiyan tookkidi shemppissees" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And for the precious fruits brought forth by the sun, and for the precious things put forth by the moon,
Wolaitta Sentences: Yooseefa zariyaabaa hagaadan yaagiis; "GODAI iraa immiyoogan, biittaappe haattaa pulttissiyoogan, eta biittaa anjjo.

English Sentences: And for the chief things of the ancient mountains, and for the precious things of the lasting hills,
Wolaitta Sentences: Awai kattiyo doorettida aifiyaaninne wodiyan wodiyan ka77iya aifiyan anjjetto.

English Sentences: And for the precious things of the earth and fulness thereof, and for the good will of him that dwelt in the bush: let the blessing come upon the head of Joseph, and upon the top of the head of him that was separated from his brethren.
Wolaitta Sentences: Beniisappe de7iya eta deretinne kerati lo77o aifiyan anjjettona.

English Sentences: His glory is like the firstling of his bullock, and his horns are like the horns of unicorns: with them he shall push the people together to the ends of the earth: and they are the ten thousands of Ephraim, and they are the thousands of Manasseh.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eta biittai lo77obaa xallaa kumidaagaa gido; buuran eexxiya tamaa giddon haasayida, GODAAPPE beettiya anjjo xallan kumidaagaa gido. Ha anjjoti ubbai Yooseefa zariyaa gakkona; aissi giikko, i ba ishanttu giddon halaqa.

English Sentences: And of Zebulun he said, Rejoice, Zebulun, in thy going out; and, Issachar, in thy tents.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yooseefi koiro yelettida korimadan mino; a kaceti menttaa kaciyaadan mino. A kaceti sha7an qoodettiya Minaase zareta; tammu sha7an qoodettiya Efireema zareta. He kacetun i kawotettata qaicana; biittaa gaxaa gakkanaashin eta i sugana" yaagiis.

English Sentences: They shall call the people unto the mountain; there they shall offer sacrifices of righteousness: for they shall suck of the abundance of the seas, and of treasures hid in the sand.
Wolaitta Sentences: Zaabiloona zariyaabaa hagaadan yaagiis; "Nenoo Zaabiloonaa, neeni ne kessan ufaitta; Yisaakooraa, neenikka ne dunkkaaniyan ufaitta.

English Sentences: And of Gad he said, Blessed be he that enlargeth Gad: he dwelleth as a lion, and teareth the arm with the crown of the head.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti kare dere asaa bantta deriyaakko xeesana; hegan eti geeshshatettaa yarshshuwaa yarshshana. Bantta aquwaanne bantta duretettaa, abbaappenne abbaa lanqqe shafiyaappe demmana" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And he provided the first part for himself, because there, in a portion of the lawgiver, was he seated; and he came with the heads of the people, he executed the justice of the LORD, and his judgments with Israel.
Wolaitta Sentences: Gaada zariyaabaa hagaadan yaagiis; "Eta biittaa aassida GODAI galatetto; Gaadi morkkiyaa som77uwaa menttanau, gaammuwaadan shankkatees.

English Sentences: And of Dan he said, Dan is a lion's whelp: he shall leap from Bashan.
Wolaitta Sentences: Halaqatussi giido payya biittaa eti ekkidosona; Israa7eela halaqati shiiqido wode, eti GODAA sheniyan geeshsha pirddaa pirddidosona" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And of Naphtali he said, O Naphtali, satisfied with favour, and full with the blessing of the LORD: possess thou the west and the south.
Wolaitta Sentences: Daana zariyaabaa hagaadan yaagiis; "Daani wodala gaammo mala; i Baasaaneppe guppidi kiyana" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And of Asher he said, Let Asher be blessed with children; let him be acceptable to his brethren, and let him dip his foot in oil.
Wolaitta Sentences: Nifttaaleema zariyaabaa hagaadan yaagiis; "Nifttaaleemi GODAA aaro kehatettaaninne anjjuwan duretiis; eta biittai Galiila Abbaappe biidi tohossa baggaa gakkees" yaagiis.

English Sentences: Thy shoes shall be iron and brass; and as thy days, so shall thy strength be.
Wolaitta Sentences: Aseera zariyaabaa hagaadan yaagiis; "Aseeri hara zaretu ubbaappe aadhdhidi anjjettidaagaa. Ba ishanttunkka dosettidaagaa gido. A biittai zaitiyan dureto.

English Sentences: There is none like unto the God of Jeshurun, who rideth upon the heaven in thy help, and in his excellency on the sky.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eta katamatikka birata kariyan gorddettidi naagettona; ba laitta ubban i wolqqaama gidona.

English Sentences: The eternal God is thy refuge, and underneath are the everlasting arms: and he shall thrust out the enemy from before thee; and shall say, Destroy them.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Nenoo Israa7eelaa, saluwaappe inttena maaddanau, ba anggan shaaran hemettiya intte Xoossaa mala xoossi baawa.

English Sentences: Israel then shall dwell in safety alone: the fountain of Jacob shall be upon a land of corn and wine; also his heavens shall drop down dew.
Wolaitta Sentences: Merinaa Xoossai intteyyo qato; a merinaa kusheti intteppe garssaara de7oosona. I intte sinttappe intte morkketa gooddiis; intte eta wurssi xaissanaadan intteyyo yootiis.

English Sentences: Happy art thou, O Israel: who is like unto thee, O people saved by the LORD, the shield of thy help, and who is the sword of thy excellency! and thine enemies shall be found liars unto thee; and thou shalt tread upon their high places.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaa gishshau, Israa7eela asai, saluwaa irai bukkiyoosan, qumainne woiniyaa eessai kumido biittan, bochchiyaabi bainnan sarotettan de7ana.

English Sentences: Then Moses went up from the plains of Moab to Mount Nebo, to the top of Pisgah, which is opposite Jericho. And the LORD showed him all the land, Gilead as far as1 And Moses went up from the plains of Moab unto the mountain of Nebo, to the top of Pisgah, that is over against Jericho. And the LORD shewed him all the land of Gilead, unto Dan,
Wolaitta Sentences: Inttenoo Israa7eela asau! Intte aiba anjjettidetii! GODAI ashshido intte mali oonee? I intteyyo gonddallenne inttena maaddiyaagaa; an intte xooniyo bisuwaa. Intte morkketi intte sinttan gufannana; inttekka eta qatuwaa laalana" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And all Naphtali, and the land of Ephraim, and Manasseh, and all the land of Judah, unto the utmost sea,
Wolaitta Sentences: Muusee Moo7aaba dembbaappe denddidi, Nabo Deriyaa huuphiyaa, qassi Yarkkoppe arshsho baggaara de7iya Pisgga Deriyaa huuphiyaa gakkiis. Hegan GODAI Daana gakkanaashin de7iya Gala7aade biittaa,

English Sentences: And the south, and the plain of the valley of Jericho, the city of palm trees, unto Zoar.
Wolaitta Sentences: Nifttaaleema biittaa ubbaa, Efireemanne Minaase biittaa, arggo baggaara biidi Meediteraane Abbaa gakkanaashin de7iya Yihudaa biittaanne

English Sentences: And the LORD said unto him, This is the land which I sware unto Abraham, unto Isaac, and unto Jacob, saying, I will give it unto thy seed: I have caused thee to see it with thine eyes, but thou shalt not go over thither.
Wolaitta Sentences: tohossa baggaara Xoo7aarappe denddidi, zambbai de7iyo Yarkko katamaa, zanggaaran de7iya dembbaa ubbaa bessiis.

English Sentences: So Moses the servant of the LORD died there in the land of Moab, according to the word of the LORD.
Wolaitta Sentences: Bessidi GODAI Muusa hagaadan yaagiis; "Abrahaamassi Yisaaqassinne Yaaqoobassi, Taani intte zariyaassi immana yaagada caaqqido biittai hagaa. Ha77i neeni ne aifiyan be7anaadan taani oottaas; shin neeni yaa pinnakka" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And he buried him in a valley in the land of Moab, over against Bethpeor: but no man knoweth of his sepulchre unto this day.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaagin GODAA ashkkaraa Muusee GODAI giidoogaadan, hegan Moo7aaba biittan haiqqiis.

English Sentences: And Moses was an hundred and twenty years old when he died: his eye was not dim, nor his natural force abated.
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAI Beeti-Pa7oora katamaappe sintta baggan Moo7aaba wombban a moogiis; shin hachchi gakkanaashin, i moogettido man77iyaa eriya asi baawa.

English Sentences: And the children of Israel wept for Moses in the plains of Moab thirty days: so the days of weeping and mourning for Moses were ended.
Wolaitta Sentences: Muusee haiqqiyo wode, a laittai xeetanne laatama; shin au aifee ixxibeenna; a wolqqaikka ixxibeenna.

English Sentences: And Joshua the son of Nun was full of the spirit of wisdom; for Moses had laid his hands upon him: and the children of Israel hearkened unto him, and did as the LORD commanded Moses.
Wolaitta Sentences: Israa7eela asai Moo7aaba dembban hasttamu gallassaa Muusessi yeekkidosona. Hegaappe guyyiyan, Muusessi yeekkiyoonne azzaniyo wodee wuriis.

English Sentences: And there arose not a prophet since in Israel like unto Moses, whom the LORD knew face to face,
Wolaitta Sentences: Nawe na7ai Yaasu aadhdhida eratettaa ayyaanan kumiis; aissi giikko, Muusee ba sohuwan i oottanaadan, a bolli ba kushiyaa wottiis. Israa7eela asai Yaasuyyo azazettiis; GODAI Muuse baggaara immido azazuwaakka naagiis.

English Sentences: In all the signs and the wonders, which the LORD sent him to do in the land of Egypt to Pharaoh, and to all his servants, and to all his land,
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAI som77uwan dummayidi erido Muuse mala hananabaa yootiya asi Israa7eelan mulekka denddibeenna.

English Sentences: And in all that mighty hand, and in all the great terror which Moses shewed in the sight of all Israel.
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAI Muusa Gibxxe kawuwaakko, aara oottiya halaqatukkonne kumetta asaakko yeddidi, a baggaara oorattabaanne maalaalissiyaabaa ubbaa oottido, Muuse mala hananabaa yootiya hara asi ooninne baawa.
